access:
Ones your booking is confirmed you can find check in instructions 48 h before arrival in your itinerary. Late check in no problem/lockbox with keys.

https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/100/where-can-i-find-check-in-information-for-my-trip?topic=371
description:
It's a bright and sunny unit with South facing balcony. 
Situated in the Belmont Theater District in the heart of Lakeview that includes 20 theaters and 100 restaurants and bars, you are steps away from Lake Michigan, Belmont Harbor, Wrigley Field, the Vic Theater, Annoyance Theater, Metro, Briar Street Theater, the Mercury Theater, and many more...

100% privacy, 2 bedroom unit. In one bedroom I have a king size bed. In the other bedroom I have a queen size bed. I also have a very comfortable queen size sleeper sofa in the Living area.

Ones your booking is confirmed you can find check in instructions 48 h before arrival in your itinerary. Late check in no problem/lockbox with keys.

https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/100/where-can-i-find-check-in-information-for-my-trip?topic=371

I am available to answer any questions or concerns if you message me on Airbnb

Bordering Lake Michigan on the north side of Chicago directly above Lincoln Park, Lakeview is home to a popular destination: Wrigley Field. Originally built in 1914 for Federal Leagues Chicago Whales, Wrigley Field is one the oldest still-operating stadiums in the MLB. It was renamed Wrigley Field in 1926 by then-owner William Wrigley Jr., a chewing gum manufacturer.

Of course, there's more to Lakeview than baseball. From the luxury high-rise apartments along Lake Shore Drive to the tree-filled streets and single-family homes in Graceland West, there's something for everyone in Lakeview. This large neighborhood consists of several smaller enclaves, including Wrigleyville, Boystown, and North Halsted. Lakeview features several theaters, such as the Music Box Theater and the Playground Theater, as well as music venues and shops. On the south end of the neighborhood, Lincoln Park is home to the Lincoln Park Zoo, a nine-hole golf course, a dog beach, and jogging trails.

A piece of cake, Near Belmont station, where you can pick up the red or brown line el trains to downtown. Divvy bike rental on the corner. There is also the Belmont bus that runs east and west, you can take to go to Lake Michigan/Lincoln Park. Of course Uber and Lyft are prevalent in my hood.

I have a washer and dryer in the unit. Free WiFi available

From the luxury high-rise apartments along Lake Shore Drive to the tree-filled streets and single-family homes in Graceland West, there's something for everyone in Lakeview. This large neighborhood consists of several smaller enclaves, including Wrigleyville, Boystown, and North Halsted. Lakeview features several theaters, such as the Music Box Theater and the Playground Theater, as well as music venues and shops. On the south end of the neighborhood, Lincoln Park is home to the Lincoln Park Zoo, a nine-hole golf course, a dog beach, and jogging trails.
notes: I have a washer and dryer in the unit. Free WiFi available
space: 100% privacy, 2 bedroom unit. In one bedroom I have a king size bed. In the other bedroom I have a queen size bed. I also have a very comfortable queen size sleeper sofa in the Living area.
summary:
It's a bright and sunny unit with South facing balcony. 
Situated in the Belmont Theater District in the heart of Lakeview that includes 20 theaters and 100 restaurants and bars, you are steps away from Lake Michigan, Belmont Harbor, Wrigley Field, the Vic Theater, Annoyance Theater, Metro, Briar Street Theater, the Mercury Theater, and many more...
transit: A piece of cake, Near Belmont station, where you can pick up the red or brown line el trains to downtown. Divvy bike rental on the corner. There is also the Belmont bus that runs east and west, you can take to go to Lake Michigan/Lincoln Park. Of course Uber and Lyft are prevalent in my hood.

access: You have access to the entire house and yards.
description:
Whether you are looking for short-term housing or an extended stay, this spectacular rehabbed 4 level-5500 sqft, 7 bd single family Lincoln Park home is great. Conveniently, this home is perfect for temporary and corporate housing. Home includes a huge eat-in granite, stainless steel kitchen with Subzero-Viking appliances, oak floors, 4 fireplaces, striking 2 story sunroom, lavish marble steam bath, 2 family rooms, and an oversized 2car garage Walk to Starbucks, restaurants, parks, and the el.

There are different and unique hangout spaces on each of the four floors.  There are three rooms with over 6 foot ceilings.  One of the three rooms is a sunroom with multiple windows!

You have access to the entire house and yards.

It is a wonderful neighborhood, considered very safe, but use caution because you in Chicago.  It is considered North DePaul.

The bus to the "EL" is one black. The brown line is three long blocks. Uber's, Lyft, and dabs are always close!

You can walk to many nice restaurants and bars.  Also, there are absolutely no parties. This is an upscale gorgeous neighborhood.  Loud noise is not permitted!

The unit has a private balcony deck. The unit includes 2 free off-street parking spots.

Do not hesitate to message me if you need anything.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules: 
Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors.  This is a quiet building and I want to ensure anyone looking to book my home understands that excessive noise can be very disruptive to my neighbors.

Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.  

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property. 
6.) Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence. Additionally, lost keys will incur a $50 per key fee.

access: You'll have full access to my 3 bedroom apartment.
description:
*SPECIAL* Dec-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Logan Square condo perfect place for your quiet group to call home in Chicago - 3 bedrooms spread over 2 floors ideal for any group! The bathroom is huge and newly renovated. Just a few blocks from the California Blue Line, and all of the restaurants and shops nearby. My place overlooks serene Palmer Square, though, so while great amenities are nearby, you're practically surrounded by treetops & tranquility.

You'll walk in through a shared building door, and into the apartment entry on the main floor. Up the stairs, you'll enter into the living room - to your right is a dining room, with library and sitting room. To your left are two bedrooms, the kitchen, and the apartments bathroom. Upstairs is an additional bedroom with 2 beds.

You'll have full access to my 3 bedroom apartment.

In Logan Square, the strong neighborly connection is evident all around, from active preservation groups to community gardens and a locally-run farmers market. "Local" being the key word when describing many aspects of the scene: ingredients are sourced locally at their buzz-worthy restaurants; corner taps tout local, craft brews; galleries showcase local artists; and concerts and street fests promote local, upstart bands.

I'm a 5 minute walk to the California Blue line station, and just steps to the California and Armitage buses - you won't have any trouble getting around town without a car from here! If you do bring your car, however, there's plenty of street parking in the neighborhood.

The downstairs neighbors are wonderful and quiet - I just ask that you're respectful.

transit: I'm a 5 minute walk to the California Blue line station, and just steps to the California and Armitage buses - you won't have any trouble getting around town without a car from here! If you do bring your car, however, there's plenty of street parking in the neighborhood.

access: Guests are welcome to enjoy the entire 2nd floor unit. Use front entrance only.
description:
Come and enjoy Chicago. Stay in your own apartment set up for you and your small group to lounge and get a comfortable nights rest every night. Whether you’re staying two nights or the entire month. You get the entire top floor apartment. 3 bedrooms with queen size beds each, fully functional kitchen with cooking and dish ware. Sunroom, pool table, balcony, several TVs and continuous WiFi. If you are here for a Cubs game or to explore Chicago this is the perfect location.

Get a glimpse of a classic Chicago neighborhood from your top floor. Plenty of natural sunlight all day. Sunrise in the rear sunroom, and sunset from the front balcony. We provide nice stainless steel appliances and clean kitchenware so you can confidentially make or prepare any meal. Enjoy a game of billiards or relax with a back and foot massage. Several TVs throughout the unit with continuous wi-fi, and streaming. Most importantly we hope you get a good nights rest in any of our three bedrooms. All have new pillow top mattresses. The couch is also a genuine lazyboy product, comfy enough to sleep in all night.

Guests are welcome to enjoy the entire 2nd floor unit. Use front entrance only.

We like to give our guests space to enjoy the space. However we will be available as needed throughout your stay.

The perfect location, the more you visit and explore the neighborhood the more you want to come back. The closest grocery store is 1 block away. Blue line train station, different 90/94 expressway entrances, Several parks and recreational areas such as pool, public mountain bike course, hiking/biking paths kayak/canoeing, The Chicago river, gas stations, restaurants, bars, department stores. Easy access to transportation. Blue line train station, Cta bus, rentable bikes/scooters, ALL walking distance!

Getting to Cubs Wrigley Field is as easy as walking one block south to Addison st and taking one bus east for about 2.5 miles to Clark st. The lakeshore 3.4 miles, United Center 6.1 miles, the Magnificent Mile 6.9 miles, Navy Pier 7.6 miles, Soldier Field 8.4 miles, Rivers casino 9.5 miles , Allstate arena 11 miles

additional_house_rules:
Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund. 

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.
6.) Please do not use the fireplace.

description:
*SPECIAL* Jan-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Our place is a pleasant and bright triplex on a quiet Lakeview street - but right off the bustle of Clark Street, and steps from shopping and restaurants. Our place sleeps up to 10 and has plenty of room to spread out for large parties, offers a free on-site parking space, and we're ideally located for all of your Chicago adventures: a quick walk to the lake, Wrigley Field, and some of the city's best music venues - book today!

You enter our home into an open living / kitchen area on the first floor, with doors that open to a patio. On the second floor is two queen bedrooms and a full bath - this is where the washer and dryer is, too. On the third floor is a large bedroom with two full-sized beds and a full bath.

Anchored by a beautiful stretch of shoreline to the east and dotted with train stops from two ‘L' lines, Lakeview is one of Chicago's liveliest and most accessible neighborhoods. Several distinct areas — East Lakeview, Central Lakeview, Boystown and Wrigleyville — meld together to form a lakefront community that celebrates diversity and boasts something for every type of visitor.

We're a 5 minute walk to the Belmont red line station, and just steps to the Halsted and Belmont buses - you won't have any trouble getting around town without a car from here!

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.
6.) Please do not use the fireplace.

description:
Cozy condo near Chicago!, walking distance to downtown Oak Park, shopping, restaurants, bus and train (green line/blue line). Many breakfast areas nearby, Coin laundry and storage in basement. Elevator building, bedroom with drawers, bathroom with towels, kitchen area to store food, and entrance closet to put jackets. Will be able to contact by cell phone for any questions!

Will be in area to help with any concerns

Next to trader joes, mcdonalds, dennys, walking distance to panera, all restaurants in downtown oak park! Also next to a park if you like to walk

Green line/blue line that takes you right to downtown!! Bus transportation and also off 290!

description:
An artery of the Heart of Chicago.  Apartment is conveniently located in East Pilsen. Walking distance from great food, entertainment, exploring and shopping. Strategically located in the middle of it all.  Explore the art galleries on Halsted St. Enjoy all the food and entertainment down 18th St.  Explore and bike ride to Soldier Field, Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium or Navy Pier.  Do a little shopping or simply walk to China town.

This Apartment sleeps 5 if you make it work.  Cozy and tidy with all amenities for the comfort that will make you feel home away from home (including complimentary coffee, tea, Netflix and HBO NOW).

Host is not on property but is available if needed.

The apartment is only blocks away from bars, food and entertainment.  30 to 40 minutes walking distance from Soldier Field, McCormick Place, Thalia Hall, and Union Station

Walking distance from Halsted Bus, 18th St bus, I90 18th St entry/exit ramp and a minute walk from Divvy (Chicago bike share).

Apartment above this listing is being remodeled. There might be some noise during your stay.
house_rules:
Before leaving;

Please clean all dirty dishes and put back in their place. Dishwasher is available for your stay.
Please place all dirty towels in washer and set to wash.  Detergent is in the laundry room bottom shelf.  Please set washer to quick was (HOT). 
Important:
Set thermostat to 62 degrees.  Please DO NOT TURN OFF THERMOSTAT.

access: You will have the entire first floor apartment.
description:
This is our 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom fully furnished apartment in the heart of Roscoe Village. Whether you’re planning a weekend excursion, business trip or need a comfortable place to stay for family or friends, consider our newly rehabbed Guesthouse.

Amenities include:
3 bedrooms (2 Queen & 1 full size bed, one pull out full couch, sleeps total of 8 people)
2 Full bathrooms with plush towels & toiletries 
Fully equipped kitchen with granite & stainless steel appliances
Quality linens 
Newly rehabbed and furnished
Flat screen plasma TV
Hardwood floors
Fireplace
First floor apt with back Deck
Access to landscaped backyard withgas  grill

You will have the entire first floor apartment.

We are a full service vacation rental agency, with a virtual front desk and concierge.

Trendy Roscoe Village offers boutique shopping and a variety of restaurants & bars.

Approx .7 miles from Addison “El” stop which will take you downtown or catch a bus half block away that will take you to the Belmont 'El' stop.

We do have a 2 bedroom 2 bath unit in the same building that could sleep an additional 6 guests. There is also a 3 bedroom 2 bath inside this building too. The property can accommodate up to 22 total guests. We have another property 1.5 blocks north that can accommodate an additional 14 guests. 2083762

additional_house_rules:
RENTAL AGREEMENT

Please read this before reserving our property:

Be very clear about your intentions when booking our home. There are to be absolutely no parties or outside guests other than those stated clearly in your reservation. Be very clear about the number of guests you are hosting in our property. If this rule is violated, we will have your entire reservation cancelled and your group removed from the property immediately without refund. Do not let this happen to you. We do not like surprises, and want to ensure all expectations are clear so everyone can enjoy their stay! By booking our property, you are agreeing to the contract below in its entirety:

Guest agrees to comply with all Terms and Conditions stated below, which are an essential part of this Agreement; Guest acknowledges he/she has read, understands, and is familiar with all Terms and Conditions. Guest understands that as Manager, host is acting on behalf of the Unit Owner as a facilitator to provide accommodation services only. Guest acknowledges that he/she and his/her guests will not be staying at a hotel, but at a private residence with no staff and that any problem that may arise at the Unit that is not reported timely (during regular office hours on business days between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM) may not be addressed until the following business day, unless it is an emergency. Guest entering this Agreement represents himself/herself as agent for all parties occupying the Unit during the period of occupancy by Guest. Guest booking this unit must be at least 25 years of age and will be responsible for all other persons occupying the Unit and/or any other person(s) from time to time present in the Unit, for compliance with this Agreement, listed policies, ordinances, rules and regulations, and for any losses incurred by Owner and/or Manager or to the Unit due to the activities of any such persons, whether intentional, negligent, or otherwise.

ADDITIONAL OCCUPANTS: This unit can accommodate a maximum of the number of 6 guests; provided, however, that the overnight occupants of the Unit will be limited to those persons listed as occupants in the reservation. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in the event that more than the agreed number of occupants spend the night at the Unit, or more than the agreed number occupants are at any given time inside the Unit, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Rental Fees and Security Deposit provided by Guest will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary.

PARTIES AND NOISE: Quite hours must be respected (10PM-8AM.) Parties and/or events of any kind are strictly prohibited at the Unit. For the purposes of this Agreement, Owner and/or Manager will consider that there is a party inside the Unit whenever the number of daytime occupants in the Unit exceeds the number of guests outlined in the reservation. Notwithstanding the former provision, even if the number of guests is not exceeded, all other common definitions of a party will be accepted, whenever the noise level inside the Unit is beyond what is reasonably accepted as normal. Any violation of this rule will result in an immediate termination of the reservations and this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary. Guest agrees to keep the noise level inside the Unit under respectable levels, so as to not interfere with the peace and quiet of any person outside the boundaries of the Unit. Failure of Guest to adhere to this clause will be considered a breach of this Agreement. Any police enforcement actions will be at the sole risk and expense of the Guest.


SMOKING INSIDE THE UNIT OR WITHIN 25-FEET OF THE UNIT IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED: Guest agrees that smoking is prohibited in the Unit, including any patios or balconies, as well as any other common area in the building. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in case of any violation of this provision, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited. A minimum charge of $250 will apply per reported incident.

LAWFUL PURPOSE: Guest agrees to use the Unit for legal and lawful purposes only. Any use of the premises that violates any international, federal, state, or local laws is grounds for immediate termination of this Agreement and eviction of Guest and all other occupants of the Unit. No firearms, explosives, or any other dangerous items or materials may be brought into the Unit.

PETS: Pets are not allowed in the property at anytime. If Guest brings a pet to the property, Guest risks forfeiting the Security Deposit. 

WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING: Plan on packing your personal toiletry items. Since we provide a limited supply of toilet paper, paper towels, and other dispensable items to get you started on your first day of vacation, you should plan on making a trip to the grocery store to replenish these items as you need them.

PARKING: Parking is available at the property for no more than 1 vehicle, and availability may vary, please consult manager for availability prior to completing the reservation.  

GUEST'S LIABILITY: Guest agrees to accept liability for any damages caused to the real and personal property (other than normal wear and tear) by Guest, other authorized occupants or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit during the period of Guest's occupancy, including, but not limited to, landscaping, misuse of appliances, and/or equipment furnished. 

FALSIFIED RESERVATIONS: Any reservations obtained under false pretenses will be subject to forfeiture of all monies paid to date of discovery of falsified information, including all Fees and the Security Deposit, and individuals providing false information will not be permitted to check in or occupy the Unit and will be required to vacate the premises immediately upon discovery of any such falsified information.

RIGHT TO ENTER: Owner and Manager have the right to inspect the Unit at any time for any purpose, including but not limited to repairs, maintenance, inspection, verification of Guest status, monitoring of proper use of the Unit, improvements to the Unit, enforcing the terms of this Agreement, showing the Unit to prospective buyers and/or prospective future guests, attending to an emergency, or for any other reason whatsoever. Owner and/or Manager will provide 1-hour notice to Guest by phone or email, except in case of an emergency when no notice is required.

NO INSURANCE: Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for the safety of Guest, any other occupants of the Unit, or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit. Guest, all occupants of the Unit, and all other persons from time to time present in the Unit, are responsible for their own safety and should maintain a safe environment while in the Unit by locking doors, windows, garage doors, setting alarms if provided, etc., when appropriate to do so. Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for any items of personal property that may be lost, stolen or left behind in the Unit. Furthermore, Guest acknowledges and agrees that any homeowner's, renter's, or any other type of insurance that may be carried by Owner and/or Manager in connection with the Unit, does not cover the personal property of Guest or any other occupants of the Unit. Guest is encouraged to secure the appropriate travelers or vacation insurance and/or renters insurance, if such coverage is desired.

OWNER AND MANAGER NOT LIABLE: Owner and Manager do not assume any liability for loss, damage or injury to persons or their personal property while at or near the Unit. Neither do Owner and Manager accept liability for any inconvenience arising from any temporary defects or stoppage in supply of water, gas, electricity or plumbing. Nor will Owner and Manager accept liability for any loss or damage caused by weather conditions, natural disasters, acts of God, or other reasons beyond their control.

CHECK IN: Unless agreed differently by the Manager in writing, check-in is any time after 3:00 PM. Manager will send Tenant the instructions for a self check-in in advance, or keys or and entry-code will be provided at property location upon check-in. Keys will not be issued with a balance owing or without a signed rental agreement in the owners, or owner's representatives, possession. Once Tenant has checked into the unit or he/she has been granted access, Tenant accepts the condition, size and configuration of the Rental Premises in as/is where/is condition and accepts full financial responsibility per this agreement.

CHECK OUT: By 11:00 am. Charges for a late check-out not timely requested will be made against your security deposit for a minimum of the nightly rental fee. Please leave all keys, garage openers and such at the location. A $75 per item fee will be charged for each lost key, $120 for lost key fob and a $150 per parking transponder fee will be charged for each item not returned.

CLEANING: Each property will be inspected and cleaned after your departure. The cleaning fee you have paid will cover this. You are required to leave the property in the same general condition that you received it by making sure, dishes are done and put away, and the trash is generally picked up and ready to be vacuumed, dusted and sanitized. If additional cleaning is required, appropriate charges will be deducted from your security deposit at the rate of $50 per hour

WALKWAYS AND BALCONIES (SELECTED UNITS): The undersigned is fully aware that these can be dangerous, that the walkways/balcony and areas around can be slippery when wet, and that injury is likely to occur to anyone who is not careful. Tenants should observe and adhere to all rules and policies as posted at the property. With full knowledge of the above facts and warnings, the undersigned accepts and assumes all risks involved in or related to the use of the walkways/balcony.

PERSONAL PROPERTY LEFT BEHIND: If found, any items left behind will be mailed back upon request via USPS. The cost of shipping, shipping container and any packing materials will be deducted from the security deposit along with a handling fee.

access: Guest have full access to the unit, building amenities, and parking garage.
description:
First Airbnb experience, or a pro? We've got you covered with a promise to provide the best experience in Chicago. Our professional team & premium selection of high-end homes makes us the perfect solution for your business travels, temporary housing, vacation, and stay-cation needs. 

With us, you can expect the cleanest homes on Airbnb, with our professional housekeeping team cleaning & preparing the home for your arrival along with high quality premium bedding and soft towels for your comfort.

So, you wish to visit Chicago, the 3rd largest City in the country? Then why not see it from the sky, looking down. Upon entering our home you will be totally AWESTRUCK. The floor to ceiling glass panoramic view will leave you astonished. YOU WILL BE AMAZED! Our luxury 3 bedroom, 2 bath home so tastefully furnished will certainly cause you to be the envy of your family and friends with all the selfies you post on social media. THEY WILL FEEL YOUR EXPERIENCE. Now, as night falls on the City, enjoy the fireworks  show from Navy Pier, every Wednesday & Saturday from your own private outdoor balcony. Have you ever encountered an experience that you wished had never ended.?This is what many guests have expressed to us personally at the end of their stay. We have been honored to host guests from all over the world and our reviews speak for themselves. Question...when is the best time to reserve our home for your visit to Chicago? Answer... before someone else does.

Guest have full access to the unit, building amenities, and parking garage.

We are here as much and as little as you'd like. Were always a call/message away.

This downtown location offers shops, dining and attractions within walking distance. Check out Michigan Avenue or Navy Pier, then stroll through Millennium Park to Buckingham Fountain –it’s all just steps away!

Private chauffeur - Tesla Model S / Mercedes S550 (Contact for details & rates) 
Private Luxury Car rentals (Bentley Bentayga, Ferrari 458 Italia, Ferrari F430,  Lamborghini Huracan, Rolls Royce, MB S63 AMG, Range Rover Autobiography - Contact for details & rates) 
2 blocks from trains
Buses around the corner
Ample taxi and private cars
Door staff can call cab for you at request.

Please note that this is a private apartment building with a 24/7 concierge & security team. This is NOT a hotel. The other people that live in the building are full-time residents, so please be considerate and respect the fact that you are guests in a place others call home. The concierge team, while extremely friendly and helpful, is not a bellhop.

*Promotional Rate subject to change without notice.
*Some services listed are optional at the expense of the leasee 
*Please feel free to ask any questions or contact ue with any concerns.  
*All charges will be discussed before booking
*If you require a parking space, please mention this in your inquiry BEFORE confirming reservation - Limited Availability
house_rules:
RENTAL AGREEMENT

Please read this before reserving our property:

Be very clear about your intentions when booking our home. There are to be absolutely no parties or outside guests other than those stated clearly in your reservation. Be very clear about the number of guests you are hosting in our property. If this rule is violated, we will have your entire reservation cancelled and your group removed from the property immediately without refund. Do not let this happen to you. We do not like surprises, and want to ensure all expectations are clear so everyone can enjoy their stay! By booking our property, you are agreeing to the contract below in its entirety:

Guest agrees to comply with all Terms and Conditions stated below, which are an essential part of this Agreement; Guest acknowledges he/she has read, understands, and is familiar with all Terms and Conditions. Guest understands that as Manager, host is acting on behalf of the Unit Owner as a facilitator to provide accommodation services only. Guest acknowledges that he/she and his/her guests will not be staying at a hotel, but at a private residence with no staff and that any problem that may arise at the Unit that is not reported timely (during regular office hours on business days between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM) may not be addressed until the following business day, unless it is an emergency. Guest entering this Agreement represents himself/herself as agent for all parties occupying the Unit during the period of occupancy by Guest. Guest booking this unit must be at least 25 years of age and will be responsible for all other persons occupying the Unit and/or any other person(s) from time to time present in the Unit, for compliance with this Agreement, listed policies, ordinances, rules and regulations, and for any losses incurred by Owner and/or Manager or to the Unit due to the activities of any such persons, whether intentional, negligent, or otherwise.

ADDITIONAL OCCUPANTS: This unit can accommodate a maximum of the number of 6 guests; provided, however, that the overnight occupants of the Unit will be limited to those persons listed as occupants in the reservation. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in the event that more than the agreed number of occupants spend the night at the Unit, or more than the agreed number occupants are at any given time inside the Unit, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Rental Fees and Security Deposit provided by Guest will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary.

PARTIES AND NOISE: Quite hours must be respected (10PM-8AM.) Parties and/or events of any kind are strictly prohibited at the Unit. For the purposes of this Agreement, Owner and/or Manager will consider that there is a party inside the Unit whenever the number of daytime occupants in the Unit exceeds the number of guests outlined in the reservation. Notwithstanding the former provision, even if the number of guests is not exceeded, all other common definitions of a party will be accepted, whenever the noise level inside the Unit is beyond what is reasonably accepted as normal. Any violation of this rule will result in an immediate termination of the reservations and this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary. Guest agrees to keep the noise level inside the Unit under respectable levels, so as to not interfere with the peace and quiet of any person outside the boundaries of the Unit. Failure of Guest to adhere to this clause will be considered a breach of this Agreement. Any police enforcement actions will be at the sole risk and expense of the Guest.


SMOKING INSIDE THE UNIT OR WITHIN 25-FEET OF THE UNIT IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED: Guest agrees that smoking is prohibited in the Unit, including any patios or balconies, as well as any other common area in the building. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in case of any violation of this provision, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited. A minimum charge of $250 will apply per reported incident.

LAWFUL PURPOSE: Guest agrees to use the Unit for legal and lawful purposes only. Any use of the premises that violates any international, federal, state, or local laws is grounds for immediate termination of this Agreement and eviction of Guest and all other occupants of the Unit. No firearms, explosives, or any other dangerous items or materials may be brought into the Unit.

PETS: Pets are not allowed in the property at anytime. If Guest brings a pet to the property, Guest risks forfeiting the Security Deposit. 

WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING: Plan on packing your personal toiletry items. Since we provide a limited supply of toilet paper, paper towels, and other dispensable items to get you started on your first day of vacation, you should plan on making a trip to the grocery store to replenish these items as you need them.

PARKING: Parking is available at the property for no more than 1 vehicle, and availability may vary, please consult manager for availability prior to completing the reservation.  

GUEST'S LIABILITY: Guest agrees to accept liability for any damages caused to the real and personal property (other than normal wear and tear) by Guest, other authorized occupants or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit during the period of Guest's occupancy, including, but not limited to, landscaping, misuse of appliances, and/or equipment furnished. 

FALSIFIED RESERVATIONS: Any reservations obtained under false pretenses will be subject to forfeiture of all monies paid to date of discovery of falsified information, including all Fees and the Security Deposit, and individuals providing false information will not be permitted to check in or occupy the Unit and will be required to vacate the premises immediately upon discovery of any such falsified information.

RIGHT TO ENTER: Owner and Manager have the right to inspect the Unit at any time for any purpose, including but not limited to repairs, maintenance, inspection, verification of Guest status, monitoring of proper use of the Unit, improvements to the Unit, enforcing the terms of this Agreement, showing the Unit to prospective buyers and/or prospective future guests, attending to an emergency, or for any other reason whatsoever. Owner and/or Manager will provide 1-hour notice to Guest by phone or email, except in case of an emergency when no notice is required.

NO INSURANCE: Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for the safety of Guest, any other occupants of the Unit, or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit. Guest, all occupants of the Unit, and all other persons from time to time present in the Unit, are responsible for their own safety and should maintain a safe environment while in the Unit by locking doors, windows, garage doors, setting alarms if provided, etc., when appropriate to do so. Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for any items of personal property that may be lost, stolen or left behind in the Unit. Furthermore, Guest acknowledges and agrees that any homeowner's, renter's, or any other type of insurance that may be carried by Owner and/or Manager in connection with the Unit, does not cover the personal property of Guest or any other occupants of the Unit. Guest is encouraged to secure the appropriate travelers or vacation insurance and/or renters insurance, if such coverage is desired.

OWNER AND MANAGER NOT LIABLE: Owner and Manager do not assume any liability for loss, damage or injury to persons or their personal property while at or near the Unit. Neither do Owner and Manager accept liability for any inconvenience arising from any temporary defects or stoppage in supply of water, gas, electricity or plumbing. Nor will Owner and Manager accept liability for any loss or damage caused by weather conditions, natural disasters, acts of God, or other reasons beyond their control.

CHECK IN: Unless agreed differently by the Manager in writing, check-in is any time after 3:00 PM. Manager will send Tenant the instructions for a self check-in in advance, or keys or and entry-code will be provided at property location upon check-in. Keys will not be issued with a balance owing or without a signed rental agreement in the owners, or owner's representatives, possession. Once Tenant has checked into the unit or he/she has been granted access, Tenant accepts the condition, size and configuration of the Rental Premises in as/is where/is condition and accepts full financial responsibility per this agreement.

CHECK OUT: By 11:00 am. Charges for a late check-out not timely requested will be made against your security deposit for a minimum of the nightly rental fee. Please leave all keys, garage openers and such at the location. A $75 per item fee will be charged for each lost key, $120 for lost key fob and a $150 per parking transponder fee will be charged for each item not returned.

CLEANING: Each property will be inspected and cleaned after your departure. The cleaning fee you have paid will cover this. You are required to leave the property in the same general condition that you received it by making sure, dishes are done and put away, and the trash is generally picked up and ready to be vacuumed, dusted and sanitized. If additional cleaning is required, appropriate charges will be deducted from your security deposit at the rate of $50 per hour

WALKWAYS AND BALCONIES (SELECTED UNITS): The undersigned is fully aware that these can be dangerous, that the walkways/balcony and areas around can be slippery when wet, and that injury is likely to occur to anyone who is not careful. Tenants should observe and adhere to all rules and policies as posted at the property. With full knowledge of the above facts and warnings, the undersigned accepts and assumes all risks involved in or related to the use of the walkways/balcony.

PERSONAL PROPERTY LEFT BEHIND: If found, any items left behind will be mailed back upon request via USPS. The cost of shipping, shipping container and any packing materials will be deducted from the security deposit along with a handling fee.

additional_house_rules:
A pet fee is charged for all pets. If you have any question about this, please ask prior to booking. Otherwise, a change request will be sent to you for the pet fee. Pet fees range from $50 to $100. Please advise if there are any infants or children in your party at the time you make your reservation request. If you have a young child, we can assist you with installing electric socket covers and a baby gate at the top of the stairs. We can also assist with other measures you want to take such as toilet lid locks. Please contact me BEFORE your arrival date so we can plan together any necessary adjustments for young children or others requiring special safety/ease of use adjustments.

HOLIDAYS/ SPECIAL EVENTS:  Please note that you should let me know if you will be having guests, especially for holidays and special events. Guests staying more than 2 nights will be charged a guest fee.  All holiday weeks and weeks of special Chicago events like Pitchfork, Lalapalooza, Cubs-Cardinals, DePaul Graduation, Air &Water show.


There is a LOST KEY charge of $200.
No smoking in the unit. Evidence of smoking in the building or a failure to dispose of all smoking materials for smoking outdoors will result in the SURRENDER OF YOUR SECURITY DEPOSIT TO CLEAN UP THE UNIT/BUILDING/EXTERIOR.

No loud TV or music after 10pm inside the building.
Chicago Noise Curfew is in effect from 11pm until 7am.  Neighbors will call the police so please be respectful.
No more than 3 additional people permitted at the property at any time during your stay.
If you have a pet with you, you must clean up after it. 

You are responsible for your possessions and property at all times during your stay.  Please purchase traveler's insurance if you will have expensive electronics or other items with you as they are not covered by the building insurance.

Prior to Your Departure
1.Load and run the dishwasher.  Please run dishwasher while you will be present.
2.Place all used towels and sheets in piles on the floor.
3.Remove all trash and recycling and place in the city cans behind the building.
4.Turn thermostat to 55 degrees if in heat mode and 82 degrees if in AC mode
5.Return labeled keys to the key box.  Leave the second set on the kitchen table.

The Cleaners are scheduled in advance and begin to charge upon their arrival.  If the Cleaner arrives, you need to depart the unit within a few minutes.  Any delay caused because you are still in the unit is inconvenient so please be respectful of the schedule.

Deck and Yard:  Please enjoy the outdoor space weather permitting.   There are cleaning supplies in your unit if you want to clean the chairs and tables.  Please throw trash into the city cans out the back gate (you can see the city cans from on the deck).  The garbage can on the deck must be emptied before you depart to help keep the property rodent free!  

No dogs, cats, or other animals shall be kept in the premises or allowed to visit the premises except with the Lessor's prior consent, and subject to the conditions set forth in any such consent. No animals are permitted without a leash in any public areas of the premises.


Hallways shall not be obstructed or used for any purpose other than ingress and egress from the building. Children are not permitted to play in the common areas unaccompanied.

access:
Once you book, you need to send me your email address so I can email you arrival instructions. I typically send arrival instructions a day or 2 before your arrival. 

We use keypads and key boxes, making check in a breeze. No need to meet with anyone - just bring your check-in information with you or access it from your phone. We do ask that guests arrive before 11pm if possible to avoid disturbing other residents in the building.

Normal check in is 3pm or later. We will attempt to accommodate requests for early arrivals but if other guests left the same day, you will likely be allowed to drop off your things to allow the unit to be cleaned. 

Departure is by 11am. Later departures will be accommodated if possible. If people are arriving the same day, we will allow you to store fully packed luggage (zipped closed with everything inside) to be stored near the entry to the unit so you can return to pick up your luggage. If you take advantage of this option, PLEASE pick up your bags by 2pm and do not access the unit, use the toilet, etc.
description:
Terrific 2 bed, 1 bath unit in an older brick row house building built immediately after the great Chicago Fire. The unit's charming hardwood floors and exposed brick are balanced by a modern kitchen and bath. Terrific location with a main L station just one block away, with express Red line service to the loop in 12 minutes. 

Note - during the summer, please do not  Instant Book for anything less than 70 nights.

This top-floor 2 bedroom, 1 bath unit is tastefully furnished and comes with an equipped modern granite kitchen, small dining area and a living room in addition to the 2 bedrooms (one queen bed, one double) and bath.  There is a sofa and an air mattress is provided for the living room for additional guests. Full marble bath with skylight.

Located 1 block from the Fullerton L stop (this is a main station with Brown, Purple and Red Line service).  We have a walk score of 95! Walk 1.5 mi North or take the Red Line 2 short stops to Wrigley Field.  The Halsted bus 3 blocks away will bring you to Greek Town and the Stadium for Blackhawks and Bulls games. The Fullerton bus on the corner will whisk you to the lakefront, Lincoln Park Zoo, Peggy Notebarte Nature Museum and more.  Wicker Park and Bucktown are easy to access by bus or a short cab ride. If you’ve brought a car, we will provide you with complimentary Zone Guest parking passes or you can rent the garage space for $25/day. 
This apartment is charming with hardwood floors and exposed brick walls, but also modern with a granite kitchen, dishwasher and central heat and A/C. We provide down comforters (or non-down if requested for those with allergies), cotton linens and towels; hair dryer; soap and shampoo; tea and coffee; secure high-speed wireless Internet; cable; and a 47” flat screen TV.  Shared building amenities include an equipped outdoor garage roof deck with gas grill, a small fenced-in back yard, and an herb garden.  
Lincoln Park has much to offer.  Within a few blocks, you’ll find shopping on Halsted, Lincoln, and Armitage; an abundance of bars and nightclubs; restaurants from the gourmet Charlie Trotters to the original PotBelly’s Sandwich Works and Lou Malnati’s pizza; the Vic concert hall; and famed Blues clubs the Kingston Mines and Blues Etc.  Whole Foods is 1 block away. and both the DePaul Athletic Center and Lake Shore Athletic Club are within 3 blocks and offer day passes. 
OTHER
This is a dog friendly building and neighborhood (Wiggly Field Dog Park is 4 blocks away).  Well-behaved pets are welcome on a case-by-case basis with a pet fee. Note dogs are not allowed in the small yard. 
We can provide a baby pak-n-play; lawn seats, cooler, grill equipment and other items to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. 
Laundry facilities are available for guests staying a week or longer.

Once you book, you need to send me your email address so I can email you arrival instructions. I typically send arrival instructions a day or 2 before your arrival. 

We use keypads and key boxes, making check in a breeze. No need to meet with anyone - just bring your check-in information with you or access it from your phone. We do ask that guests arrive before 11pm if possible to avoid disturbing other residents in the building.

Normal check in is 3pm or later. We will attempt to accommodate requests for early arrivals but if other guests left the same day, you will likely be allowed to drop off your things to allow the unit to be cleaned. 

Departure is by 11am. Later departures will be accommodated if possible. If people are arriving the same day, we will allow you to store fully packed luggage (zipped closed with everything inside) to be stored near the entry to the unit so you can return to pick up your luggage. If you take advantage of this option, PLEASE pick up your bags by 2pm and do not access the unit, use the toilet, etc.

If live in California, but I have an onsite manager, Ness, who can handle most issues during reasonable hours. If it is 2am Chicago time and you have locked yourself out of the building, please call me.  If you want more towels or have other non-urgent needs, please contact Ness before 9pm.  For non-emergencies, please send a message through the system or call/text. If you are contacting me, please remember that California is 2 hours behind Chicago.

Once you book, you need to send me your email address so I can email you arrival instructions. I typically send arrival instructions a day or 2 before your arrival.

Safe, tree-lined neighborhood with easy beach access. We have a walk score of 95! Lincoln Park is a great neighborhood where people live and work. There are many shops, bars and restaurants in walking distance.

We have a walk score of 95!

Public transportation is very simple here. The Fullerton L stop (this is a main station with Brown, Purple and Red Line service) is one block away and Whole Foods is located just next to the station.   Walk 1.5 mi North or take the Red Line 2 short stops to Wrigley Field.  The Halsted bus 3 blocks away will bring you to Greek Town and the Stadium for Blackhawks and Bulls games. The Fullerton bus on the corner will whisk you to the lakefront, Lincoln Park Zoo, Peggy Notebarte Nature Museum and more. 

You really should not need a car to do most tourist things but if you do have a car with you, there is street parking or you can rent the garage spot on a first-come, first-served basis.

There is street parking. If you plan to park on the street, please look to park on Seminary, the street on which the building is located.  Seminary is not zoned but some of the neighboring ones are. In case you need to park on a nearby zoned street, we provide overnight guest zone stickers.  Note – these stickers will not help you in other parts of the city and need to be filled out in ink and displayed on the windshield. 

 We also have one garage space available at $25/day (less if you are staying for awhile).  If you are interested in parking in the garage, please inquire if it is open for your travel dates and book in advance. The garage is immediately behind the building and we will provide you with the garage key and an electric garage door opener.
house_rules:
A pet fee is charged for all pets. If you have any question about this, please ask prior to booking. Otherwise, a change request will be sent to you for the pet fee. Pet fees range from $50 to $100. Please advise if there are any infants or children in your party at the time you make your reservation request. If you have a young child, we can assist you with installing electric socket covers and a baby gate at the top of the stairs. We can also assist with other measures you want to take such as toilet lid locks. Please contact me BEFORE your arrival date so we can plan together any necessary adjustments for young children or others requiring special safety/ease of use adjustments.

HOLIDAYS/ SPECIAL EVENTS:  Please note that you should let me know if you will be having guests, especially for holidays and special events. Guests staying more than 2 nights will be charged a guest fee.  All holiday weeks and weeks of special Chicago events like Pitchfork, Lalapalooza, Cubs-Cardinals, DePaul Graduation, Air &Water show.


There is a LOST KEY charge of $200.
No smoking in the unit. Evidence of smoking in the building or a failure to dispose of all smoking materials for smoking outdoors will result in the SURRENDER OF YOUR SECURITY DEPOSIT TO CLEAN UP THE UNIT/BUILDING/EXTERIOR.

No loud TV or music after 10pm inside the building.
Chicago Noise Curfew is in effect from 11pm until 7am.  Neighbors will call the police so please be respectful.
No more than 3 additional people permitted at the property at any time during your stay.
If you have a pet with you, you must clean up after it. 

You are responsible for your possessions and property at all times during your stay.  Please purchase traveler's insurance if you will have expensive electronics or other items with you as they are not covered by the building insurance.

Prior to Your Departure
1.Load and run the dishwasher.  Please run dishwasher while you will be present.
2.Place all used towels and sheets in piles on the floor.
3.Remove all trash and recycling and place in the city cans behind the building.
4.Turn thermostat to 55 degrees if in heat mode and 82 degrees if in AC mode
5.Return labeled keys to the key box.  Leave the second set on the kitchen table.

The Cleaners are scheduled in advance and begin to charge upon their arrival.  If the Cleaner arrives, you need to depart the unit within a few minutes.  Any delay caused because you are still in the unit is inconvenient so please be respectful of the schedule.

Deck and Yard:  Please enjoy the outdoor space weather permitting.   There are cleaning supplies in your unit if you want to clean the chairs and tables.  Please throw trash into the city cans out the back gate (you can see the city cans from on the deck).  The garbage can on the deck must be emptied before you depart to help keep the property rodent free!  

No dogs, cats, or other animals shall be kept in the premises or allowed to visit the premises except with the Lessor's prior consent, and subject to the conditions set forth in any such consent. No animals are permitted without a leash in any public areas of the premises.


Hallways shall not be obstructed or used for any purpose other than ingress and egress from the building. Children are not permitted to play in the common areas unaccompanied.

summary:
Terrific 2 bed, 1 bath unit in an older brick row house building built immediately after the great Chicago Fire. The unit's charming hardwood floors and exposed brick are balanced by a modern kitchen and bath. Terrific location with a main L station just one block away, with express Red line service to the loop in 12 minutes. 

Note - during the summer, please do not  Instant Book for anything less than 70 nights.

access: Guests have access to the entire space, including the backyard and outdoor seating. Unpack your belongings into one of the many closets; use the washing machine and dryer. Parking will be available to guests upon request.
description:
Turn on the market lighting and sit in the garden with a glass of wine. Follow up with a Netflix show in the den. Start the next day in the breakfast nook, with windows on 3 sides and extra illumination from a Rejuvenation hand-made light.

In the evening, turn on the market lights and enjoy the private garden with a glass of wine. When you return from exploring the city, relax in the den and enjoy Netflix, HD cable and high-speed internet.

Guests have access to the entire space, including the backyard and outdoor seating. Unpack your belongings into one of the many closets; use the washing machine and dryer. Parking will be available to guests upon request.

Larry and Megan are readily available for all guests during their stays. Keyless entry allows for seamless check-in and checkout.  We provide a small booklet explaining the house, use of appliances and neighborhood tips.

Take a short stroll to discover the many restaurants, cafes, and independent stores of Andersonville, known as the  “Shop Local Capital of Chicago”. Walk to Hollywood Beach in 15 minutes, with the drive to Wrigley Field taking even less time.

The unit is approximately 20 minute drive to downtown, depending on traffic. However, the drive is quite easy as the unit is close to Lakeshore Drive, which will take you directly downtown.

The unit is steps away from the Ashland bus, Damon bus and Clark bus--feel free to ask us about using the buses.

The unit is a ten-fifteen minute walk to the redline which will take you directly downtown.

If you need more room, please visit our other listing: jean's house: a thoughtfully designed duplex down. Note, that if both units are available and you need the space, we're willing to offer a discounted rate for booking both units!

Jean's House is located on a very residential street; if you're hosting a gathering, please be mindful of our neighbors.

additional_house_rules:
1) We expect you to give us back the  room clean.
2)There is a big garbage can outside the door. Please put the garbage out.
3) If the number of people doesn't match with the number on the reservation then you will be charged $30.00 for each additional person per night.
4) If you bring a dog without our permission you will be charged an additional $50.00.
5) Our house is no smoking
6) If you wish to check out after 12 PM you have to make arrangements with us ahead of time, if not you will be charged an additional $30.00
7) We live on top of the suite. Our neighborhood is quiet and we expect you  be quiet and respectful as well.

access: Use the out side the  barbecue, kids play area
description:
Our lovely home is located in a quiet , safe in residential neighbor hood at south of Evanston. You will have access to a private flat and a sub-basement attached to our house were we currently live.

I am always available to be contacted in person. We are speaking English, French, Farsi, poco Espanol.

Our home is close to Chicago also close to Northwestern University. Also close to public transportation. Living in our home do not need a car.

Use the out side the  barbecue, kids play area

My husband and I are retired. We love to travel and to know different cultures. we have  lived in  Paris for 12 years, 4 years in California. Now for the last 25 years, we are living in Evanston, we love our city and our 2 daughters graduated from here. I had a day care for more than 20 years. one whole room is full of the toys for all ages attached to the second bedroom. 
My husband owned and managed a Persian restaurant with a Northern twist for seven years.

Evanston is known as one of the best neighbor hood . there are many restaurants, pubs,  breweries , movie theaters, public library.

The bus 93  takes to purple line, down town Evanston an Northwestern University. Bus 97 goes to Wood field Mall . we are ten minutes drive to the beaches of lake Michigan. We are close to bike paths .

If they have children , we provide baby sitting for extra charge. Also we can provide Persian dinner for additional fee.
house_rules:
1) We expect you to give us back the  room clean.
2)There is a big garbage can outside the door. Please put the garbage out.
3) If the number of people doesn't match with the number on the reservation then you will be charged $30.00 for each additional person per night.
4) If you bring a dog without our permission you will be charged an additional $50.00.
5) Our house is no smoking
6) If you wish to check out after 12 PM you have to make arrangements with us ahead of time, if not you will be charged an additional $30.00
7) We live on top of the suite. Our neighborhood is quiet and we expect you  be quiet and respectful as well.

access: You'll have your own entry to the loft.
description:
Imagine sleeping in a Marine Layer store, except with a bed and shower, and without clothes to purchase (although you'll receive a sweet discount down stairs during your stay)
Check out our store online @marinelayer!

While Marine Layer is still just a clothing company, The Loft is our take on a rad place to hang your hat while you visit Chicago. Pretty much, it's a Mad Men styled apartment nestled above our store of absurdly soft shirts.

You'll have your own entry to the loft.

Our store is right under the loft, and you're always welcome to pop by (and shop with a 15% discount). But otherwise, we'll stay out of your hair.


Store hours are 10am-8pm daily

Bucktown is one of the friendliest neighborhoods in Chicago. Damen Ave is riddled with small businesses and local restaurants for you to check out. If it's live music, good food, or a party you're looking to have Bucktown has it all! It's got the big city culture with the small town feel.

We have a variety of options for street parking conveniently located within walking distance from the ML Loft. A map of said streets will be provided to you upon your arrival. 

No car? No problem!

Step 1) Head to your nearest 24 hour Walgreens (conveniently located just a few blocks away) or your local CTA train station (The Damen Blue Line Station is also conveniently located just a few blocks away) and get yourself a Ventra card from one of the Ventra card vendors. One of the CTA personnel will be around to assist you if need be. 

Step 2) Load a 1, 3, or 7 day pass onto your Ventra card. 

Step 3) You now have unlimited rides on both the CTA bus and train system!

Even though this is a larger space, there is not a full kitchen, just a kitchenette. And the bathroom is not so spacious. Take a look at the pictures and let us know if you have any questions about the amenities.
house_rules:
We're all about bending the rules, but in this case, please leave the place as you found it. 

1) Place all dirty sheets and towels in the laundry bag (located in the bathroom)

2) Put all dirty dishes in the sink

3) Leave keys on the mini bar or with ML employee. There is a $10 fee for any keys that are lost or not returned upon your check out. 

4) Lock the door handle and dead bolt on your way out

5) No smoking allowed

6) No pets allowed

access:
Fantastic apartment available, full of character, and staying here is affordable and a real treat, something that will be a warm part of your memory of visiting Chicago.
Neutrally decorated and furnished with high quality furniture.
The location is fantastic, close to the heart of downtown.

Private Studio:

-Bright and airy room with king bed, closet, bed linens, blankets and soft pillows. 
-High-Speed Wi-Fi connection
-The sofa is a contemporary design that you will love to rest
-TV with Freeview channels + Netflix
-Complete Bathroom: Bathtub shower for a relaxing bath. Complementary: hairdryer, body soap, shampoo, conditioner, large towels.
-Private Kitchen: all the modern conveniences you would require from a kitchen for basic cooking. Complimentary salt & pepper, electric kettle, coffee maker, toaster, refrigerator, stove, oven, glasses, dishes, pots and pans & cutlery.
-Washer & Dryer inside the unit.
- A/C and heating in all the place.


NOTE - If you are 3 guests, inform us to provide an extra bed.
description:
Studio located in Chicago's Loop, a vibrant area featuring eclectic eateries, shops, theaters and parks. There are many attractions within walking distance, like Millenium Park where you can see the iconic “Cloud Gate” sculpture, and the renowned Art Institute of Chicago. 
With beautifully finishes, fast Wi-Fi service, in-home washers and dryers, gym, pool, king bed, Netflix and all the amenities, you will have all you need to accommodate an active, healthy and social lifestyle in our home.

description:
Completely rehabbed 2 level -  4 beddroom - 2 bath -  2,300 sf duplex greystone apartment in Andersonville - Chicago, IL.  Every amenity including high speed wifi, cable tv, fully stocked bathroom with plush Turkish bath towels, full kitchen, 3 new queen sized beds in bedrooms , and  outdoor deck.

This charming vintage grey stone that was gut rehabbed from the studs up in 2016. Everything is brand new.
- Super fast Wifi and cable TV
- 1.5 blocks from Clark Street with its amazing Chicago Dining

This unit is a two story duplex down with two bedrooms and two bathrooms on each level.  The lower level had a huge entertainment room with TV and large sofa that can seat 8.

Distinctive to Andersonville is a lack of national chains (except Starbucks). In fact, the neighborhood's commercial district is made up almost entirely of independent, locally-owned businesses. Between its specialty bakeries, dynamic bar scene and incredible array of stylish boutiques, Andersonville is a thriving example of colorful urban living.

Close to Clark Street's fabled "restaurant strip," you will find craft brew emporium Hopleaf Bar, epic brunch spot m. henry and some of the city's best comfort food at Big Jones. Hamburger Mary's is famous for its lively dining atmosphere and outstanding ground chuck. In addition, Hamburger Mary's hosts award-winning stage shows at an in-house theater, which is precisely the kind of eccentric charm that you can expect in Andersonville.

This is a great safe neighborhood.  The building provides additional security measures such as security lighting and an outside security camera system protecting the alley and front entrances.
house_rules: Please respect the neighbors and turn the volume down after 9:00 PM.  This is strictly a non-smoking building.  Any violation of the no smoking policy will result in a $250 deep cleaning fee.

description:
Drexel Suites Two welcomes you to the comforts of a home away from home.  Conveniently located in the culturally diverse and historic neighborhood of Hyde Park and minutes walking distance to President Barack Obama's mansion.  Only 10 to 15 minutes travel time to the University of Chicago Campus, McCormick Place, downtown Chicago, Grant Park, navy Pier, Lake Michigan and many historical museums.  Hyde Park offers a plethora of restaurants, shops and entertainment venues.

There are three private bedrooms in Drexel Suites Two.  Although there are shared common spaces, each room is private and secure.  Drexel Suites Two is perfect for extended stays, ideal for families and groups, single travelers and couples.

Upon your arrival, you will be greeted by the host or co-host to acquaint you with the space and we will be available through-out the duration of your stay for any concerns, questions or friendly chats.

A neighborhood feature is the beautiful Washington Park only minutes away for jogging or strolls.  During warmer weather, enjoy many festivals, sporting events and jazz under the stars in the park.  The historical African American "DuSable Museum" is also located near Washington Park.

Bus transportation is less than a block away.  The metra train is about 10 minutes away and will take you directly inside McCormick Convention Center.  Street parking is plentiful, free and available in the neighborhood. 
The University of Chicago Hospital and Emergency Room is less than 10 minutes away.  There is a pharmacy and convenience store "Walgreens" appx 1/2 block away.  Also, Walmart Foods is within walking distance from the airbnb.

description:
2nd floor apartment in a quiet 2 bedroom will keep you happy and relaxed for your stay. You have access to the kitchen and free WiFi. The Brickyard mall is less than five minutes away. Lots of shopping stores to chose from.

Bungalow home was bulit in the 1920s. Cozy 2 bedroom apt with a small kitchen. Free parking and quiet house to sleep in. There is a living room space and a remodel bathroom.

Free WiFi, heat, and use what you need in the kitchen. Please keep the place tidy and clean as it was in the beginning. There is refrigerator, toaster, blender, utilises, coffee maker, and stove. AC window gets place on June 1st if it's really hot outside and gets taken down September 1st. Heater gets turned on when it's gets chilly outside. Thank you!

My mom Laura and aunt Julie, will be home for any assistance, we are more than happy to help you. My mom and aunt live underneath the apt. Just call or knock on the door.

It's a quiet neighborhood and you will have a great time here. There is a big park next to the block great for walking or morning jog. There is a mall walking distance less than 5 minutes. Jewels Osco, Farmers Best Market, Target, Ross,Marshall, Aldi, Starbucks, Dollar Tree, X-port fitness, Dunkin Donuts, China buffet, AT&T, Sprint, T-mobile,etc. There are plenty of restaurants to choice from and lots of site seeing especially Oak Park location not to far from the house about 10 minute drive

There is public transportation around the neighborhood all directions. There is free parking on the block and park side. About 20 minute drive away from the o'hare airport. 30 minute drive to downtown Navy Pier which got remodeled. An hour on 65 Grand bus to downtown.

access: The entire apartment is available to our guests.
description:
Centrally located 3 bedroom loft in a beautiful historic building. Located within two blocks of many destinations including Lagunitas Brewery, Cinespace Film Studios, and Douglas Park (Riotfest). Just 5 minutes to Pilsen (18th St), 10 minutes to the West Loop, and 15 minutes to downtown (The Loop) via the California Pink Line L Train Stop.

This unit has been totally rebuilt from the brick out and features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, solid oak floors, and high ceilings.

We have a lot of fun decorating our units with art and special pieces of furniature. We hope you enjoy this space and all that is contained within.

The entire apartment is available to our guests.

Pilsen is one of Chicago's hottest neighborhoods and features culture, nightlife, as well as direct proximity to downtown. This corner of the neighborhood has it all; a train stop, a large park, a Michelin Star restauraunt, a film studio, and one of the largest single craft brewery facilities in the United States. Just two stops down the Pink Line is the 18th street retail district in Pilsen (Thalia Hall, National Museum of Mexican Art, and many shops, bars, and restaurants). Just two stops further is Chicago's West Loop and Restaurant row. Beyond that is downtown/the Loop.

This is the perfect location from which to explore the city!

The California Pink Line Station is two blocks (5 min) to the West and the Western Ave Pink Line Station is 3 Blocks to the East (7 min). There are 4 bus routes which will take  you in all directions (N/S and E/W) within 3 blocks of the building: the #49 Western Ave,  the #18 18th Street, #52 California Ave, and #21 Cermak Ave. The Metra BNSF Western Ave commuter rail station is six blocks (10 min) away.

Coin Laundry is availible in the basement, detergent is provided on the shelf in the first bedroom when you enter the apartment.

description:
1400sqft Historic 2 Bedroom with high ceiling in Lincoln Park with modern feel, Steps away from several parks, Lincoln Park Zoo, public transportation and much more. Exposed brick and stained glass windows give you a feel for history.

The entire apartment but the closet in hallway

Self check-in however Myself or someone will be available to answer any questions by text, email or simply a phone call

The building is a historic site and there are many highly rated restaurants close by in addition to blues bar and parks.

Walk to the beach, the parks  or a bus stop to go other part of the city.

1- must climb 4 to 7 stairs
2- smoking is not permitted in the building but could be done out on the back deck
3- no pets come however I can make exception to that if the situation is right
4- Rolling AC unit could be provided in addition to central Air if needed.

additional_house_rules:
-Guests must read and understand the detailed welcome message and self check in instructions on the Airbnb app. 

-Leave the apartment at least as nice as it was when you arrived.  As the boyscouts say, "try to leave this world a little better than you found it."  This is a more self sufficient Airbnb than many (which is why it is so affordable!) so teamwork is required.  You are expected to clean up after yourself and help contribute to keeping the place clean.  

-Please make the bed with the clean sheets provided before you check out.  Leave your sheets and towels in the hamper.  

-Default check in is 3pm, checkout at 12pm noon.  We are flexible and can easily accommodate early check in and late checkout upon request.

-Shoes off at the door

-Make sure all dishes are washed and put away before checkout

-No unregistered guests are allowed on the property without approval (and obviously no parties!)

-No eating or drinking within the bedrooms. 

-Smoking is not allowed in the property.  If you smoke outside the property, cigarette butts must be discarded in the bucket provided or into your own receptacle.  Do not leave cigarette butts on the ground.
