additional_house_rules:
RENTAL AGREEMENT

Please read this before reserving our property:

Be very clear about your intentions when booking our home. There are to be absolutely no parties or outside guests other than those stated clearly in your reservation. Be very clear about the number of guests you are hosting in our property. If this rule is violated, we will have your entire reservation cancelled and your group removed from the property immediately without refund. Do not let this happen to you. We do not like surprises, and want to ensure all expectations are clear so everyone can enjoy their stay! By booking our property, you are agreeing to the contract below in its entirety:

Guest agrees to comply with all Terms and Conditions stated below, which are an essential part of this Agreement; Guest acknowledges he/she has read, understands, and is familiar with all Terms and Conditions. Guest understands that as Manager, host is acting on behalf of the Unit Owner as a facilitator to provide accommodation services only. Guest acknowledges that he/she and his/her guests will not be staying at a hotel, but at a private residence with no staff and that any problem that may arise at the Unit that is not reported timely (during regular office hours on business days between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM) may not be addressed until the following business day, unless it is an emergency. Guest entering this Agreement represents himself/herself as agent for all parties occupying the Unit during the period of occupancy by Guest. Guest booking this unit must be at least 25 years of age and will be responsible for all other persons occupying the Unit and/or any other person(s) from time to time present in the Unit, for compliance with this Agreement, listed policies, ordinances, rules and regulations, and for any losses incurred by Owner and/or Manager or to the Unit due to the activities of any such persons, whether intentional, negligent, or otherwise.

ADDITIONAL OCCUPANTS: This unit can accommodate a maximum of the number of 6 guests; provided, however, that the overnight occupants of the Unit will be limited to those persons listed as occupants in the reservation. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in the event that more than the agreed number of occupants spend the night at the Unit, or more than the agreed number occupants are at any given time inside the Unit, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Rental Fees and Security Deposit provided by Guest will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary.

PARTIES AND NOISE: Quite hours must be respected (10PM-8AM.) Parties and/or events of any kind are strictly prohibited at the Unit. For the purposes of this Agreement, Owner and/or Manager will consider that there is a party inside the Unit whenever the number of daytime occupants in the Unit exceeds the number of guests outlined in the reservation. Notwithstanding the former provision, even if the number of guests is not exceeded, all other common definitions of a party will be accepted, whenever the noise level inside the Unit is beyond what is reasonably accepted as normal. Any violation of this rule will result in an immediate termination of the reservations and this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary. Guest agrees to keep the noise level inside the Unit under respectable levels, so as to not interfere with the peace and quiet of any person outside the boundaries of the Unit. Failure of Guest to adhere to this clause will be considered a breach of this Agreement. Any police enforcement actions will be at the sole risk and expense of the Guest.


SMOKING INSIDE THE UNIT OR WITHIN 25-FEET OF THE UNIT IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED: Guest agrees that smoking is prohibited in the Unit, including any patios or balconies, as well as any other common area in the building. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in case of any violation of this provision, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited. A minimum charge of $250 will apply per reported incident.

LAWFUL PURPOSE: Guest agrees to use the Unit for legal and lawful purposes only. Any use of the premises that violates any international, federal, state, or local laws is grounds for immediate termination of this Agreement and eviction of Guest and all other occupants of the Unit. No firearms, explosives, or any other dangerous items or materials may be brought into the Unit.

PETS: Pets are not allowed in the property at anytime. If Guest brings a pet to the property, Guest risks forfeiting the Security Deposit. 

WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING: Plan on packing your personal toiletry items. Since we provide a limited supply of toilet paper, paper towels, and other dispensable items to get you started on your first day of vacation, you should plan on making a trip to the grocery store to replenish these items as you need them.

PARKING: Parking is available at the property for no more than 1 vehicle, and availability may vary, please consult manager for availability prior to completing the reservation.  

GUEST'S LIABILITY: Guest agrees to accept liability for any damages caused to the real and personal property (other than normal wear and tear) by Guest, other authorized occupants or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit during the period of Guest's occupancy, including, but not limited to, landscaping, misuse of appliances, and/or equipment furnished. 

FALSIFIED RESERVATIONS: Any reservations obtained under false pretenses will be subject to forfeiture of all monies paid to date of discovery of falsified information, including all Fees and the Security Deposit, and individuals providing false information will not be permitted to check in or occupy the Unit and will be required to vacate the premises immediately upon discovery of any such falsified information.

RIGHT TO ENTER: Owner and Manager have the right to inspect the Unit at any time for any purpose, including but not limited to repairs, maintenance, inspection, verification of Guest status, monitoring of proper use of the Unit, improvements to the Unit, enforcing the terms of this Agreement, showing the Unit to prospective buyers and/or prospective future guests, attending to an emergency, or for any other reason whatsoever. Owner and/or Manager will provide 1-hour notice to Guest by phone or email, except in case of an emergency when no notice is required.

NO INSURANCE: Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for the safety of Guest, any other occupants of the Unit, or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit. Guest, all occupants of the Unit, and all other persons from time to time present in the Unit, are responsible for their own safety and should maintain a safe environment while in the Unit by locking doors, windows, garage doors, setting alarms if provided, etc., when appropriate to do so. Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for any items of personal property that may be lost, stolen or left behind in the Unit. Furthermore, Guest acknowledges and agrees that any homeowner's, renter's, or any other type of insurance that may be carried by Owner and/or Manager in connection with the Unit, does not cover the personal property of Guest or any other occupants of the Unit. Guest is encouraged to secure the appropriate travelers or vacation insurance and/or renters insurance, if such coverage is desired.

OWNER AND MANAGER NOT LIABLE: Owner and Manager do not assume any liability for loss, damage or injury to persons or their personal property while at or near the Unit. Neither do Owner and Manager accept liability for any inconvenience arising from any temporary defects or stoppage in supply of water, gas, electricity or plumbing. Nor will Owner and Manager accept liability for any loss or damage caused by weather conditions, natural disasters, acts of God, or other reasons beyond their control.

CHECK IN: Unless agreed differently by the Manager in writing, check-in is any time after 3:00 PM. Manager will send Tenant the instructions for a self check-in in advance, or keys or and entry-code will be provided at property location upon check-in. Keys will not be issued with a balance owing or without a signed rental agreement in the owners, or owner's representatives, possession. Once Tenant has checked into the unit or he/she has been granted access, Tenant accepts the condition, size and configuration of the Rental Premises in as/is where/is condition and accepts full financial responsibility per this agreement.

CHECK OUT: By 11:00 am. Charges for a late check-out not timely requested will be made against your security deposit for a minimum of the nightly rental fee. Please leave all keys, garage openers and such at the location. A $75 per item fee will be charged for each lost key, $120 for lost key fob and a $150 per parking transponder fee will be charged for each item not returned.

CLEANING: Each property will be inspected and cleaned after your departure. The cleaning fee you have paid will cover this. You are required to leave the property in the same general condition that you received it by making sure, dishes are done and put away, and the trash is generally picked up and ready to be vacuumed, dusted and sanitized. If additional cleaning is required, appropriate charges will be deducted from your security deposit at the rate of $50 per hour

WALKWAYS AND BALCONIES (SELECTED UNITS): The undersigned is fully aware that these can be dangerous, that the walkways/balcony and areas around can be slippery when wet, and that injury is likely to occur to anyone who is not careful. Tenants should observe and adhere to all rules and policies as posted at the property. With full knowledge of the above facts and warnings, the undersigned accepts and assumes all risks involved in or related to the use of the walkways/balcony.

PERSONAL PROPERTY LEFT BEHIND: If found, any items left behind will be mailed back upon request via USPS. The cost of shipping, shipping container and any packing materials will be deducted from the security deposit along with a handling fee.

access: Guest have full access to the unit, building amenities, and parking garage.
description:
First Airbnb experience, or a pro? We've got you covered with a promise to provide the best experience in Chicago. Our professional team & premium selection of high-end homes makes us the perfect solution for your business travels, temporary housing, vacation, and stay-cation needs. 

With us, you can expect the cleanest homes on Airbnb, with our professional housekeeping team cleaning & preparing the home for your arrival along with high quality premium bedding and soft towels for your comfort.

So, you wish to visit Chicago, the 3rd largest City in the country? Then why not see it from the sky, looking down. Upon entering our home you will be totally AWESTRUCK. The floor to ceiling glass panoramic view will leave you astonished. YOU WILL BE AMAZED! Our luxury 3 bedroom, 2 bath home so tastefully furnished will certainly cause you to be the envy of your family and friends with all the selfies you post on social media. THEY WILL FEEL YOUR EXPERIENCE. Now, as night falls on the City, enjoy the fireworks  show from Navy Pier, every Wednesday & Saturday from your own private outdoor balcony. Have you ever encountered an experience that you wished had never ended.?This is what many guests have expressed to us personally at the end of their stay. We have been honored to host guests from all over the world and our reviews speak for themselves. Question...when is the best time to reserve our home for your visit to Chicago? Answer... before someone else does.

Guest have full access to the unit, building amenities, and parking garage.

We are here as much and as little as you'd like. Were always a call/message away.

This downtown location offers shops, dining and attractions within walking distance. Check out Michigan Avenue or Navy Pier, then stroll through Millennium Park to Buckingham Fountain –it’s all just steps away!

Private chauffeur - Tesla Model S / Mercedes S550 (Contact for details & rates) 
Private Luxury Car rentals (Bentley Bentayga, Ferrari 458 Italia, Ferrari F430,  Lamborghini Huracan, Rolls Royce, MB S63 AMG, Range Rover Autobiography - Contact for details & rates) 
2 blocks from trains
Buses around the corner
Ample taxi and private cars
Door staff can call cab for you at request.

Please note that this is a private apartment building with a 24/7 concierge & security team. This is NOT a hotel. The other people that live in the building are full-time residents, so please be considerate and respect the fact that you are guests in a place others call home. The concierge team, while extremely friendly and helpful, is not a bellhop.

*Promotional Rate subject to change without notice.
*Some services listed are optional at the expense of the leasee 
*Please feel free to ask any questions or contact ue with any concerns.  
*All charges will be discussed before booking
*If you require a parking space, please mention this in your inquiry BEFORE confirming reservation - Limited Availability
house_rules:
RENTAL AGREEMENT

Please read this before reserving our property:

Be very clear about your intentions when booking our home. There are to be absolutely no parties or outside guests other than those stated clearly in your reservation. Be very clear about the number of guests you are hosting in our property. If this rule is violated, we will have your entire reservation cancelled and your group removed from the property immediately without refund. Do not let this happen to you. We do not like surprises, and want to ensure all expectations are clear so everyone can enjoy their stay! By booking our property, you are agreeing to the contract below in its entirety:

Guest agrees to comply with all Terms and Conditions stated below, which are an essential part of this Agreement; Guest acknowledges he/she has read, understands, and is familiar with all Terms and Conditions. Guest understands that as Manager, host is acting on behalf of the Unit Owner as a facilitator to provide accommodation services only. Guest acknowledges that he/she and his/her guests will not be staying at a hotel, but at a private residence with no staff and that any problem that may arise at the Unit that is not reported timely (during regular office hours on business days between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM) may not be addressed until the following business day, unless it is an emergency. Guest entering this Agreement represents himself/herself as agent for all parties occupying the Unit during the period of occupancy by Guest. Guest booking this unit must be at least 25 years of age and will be responsible for all other persons occupying the Unit and/or any other person(s) from time to time present in the Unit, for compliance with this Agreement, listed policies, ordinances, rules and regulations, and for any losses incurred by Owner and/or Manager or to the Unit due to the activities of any such persons, whether intentional, negligent, or otherwise.

ADDITIONAL OCCUPANTS: This unit can accommodate a maximum of the number of 6 guests; provided, however, that the overnight occupants of the Unit will be limited to those persons listed as occupants in the reservation. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in the event that more than the agreed number of occupants spend the night at the Unit, or more than the agreed number occupants are at any given time inside the Unit, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Rental Fees and Security Deposit provided by Guest will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary.

PARTIES AND NOISE: Quite hours must be respected (10PM-8AM.) Parties and/or events of any kind are strictly prohibited at the Unit. For the purposes of this Agreement, Owner and/or Manager will consider that there is a party inside the Unit whenever the number of daytime occupants in the Unit exceeds the number of guests outlined in the reservation. Notwithstanding the former provision, even if the number of guests is not exceeded, all other common definitions of a party will be accepted, whenever the noise level inside the Unit is beyond what is reasonably accepted as normal. Any violation of this rule will result in an immediate termination of the reservations and this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary. Guest agrees to keep the noise level inside the Unit under respectable levels, so as to not interfere with the peace and quiet of any person outside the boundaries of the Unit. Failure of Guest to adhere to this clause will be considered a breach of this Agreement. Any police enforcement actions will be at the sole risk and expense of the Guest.


SMOKING INSIDE THE UNIT OR WITHIN 25-FEET OF THE UNIT IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED: Guest agrees that smoking is prohibited in the Unit, including any patios or balconies, as well as any other common area in the building. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in case of any violation of this provision, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited. A minimum charge of $250 will apply per reported incident.

LAWFUL PURPOSE: Guest agrees to use the Unit for legal and lawful purposes only. Any use of the premises that violates any international, federal, state, or local laws is grounds for immediate termination of this Agreement and eviction of Guest and all other occupants of the Unit. No firearms, explosives, or any other dangerous items or materials may be brought into the Unit.

PETS: Pets are not allowed in the property at anytime. If Guest brings a pet to the property, Guest risks forfeiting the Security Deposit. 

WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING: Plan on packing your personal toiletry items. Since we provide a limited supply of toilet paper, paper towels, and other dispensable items to get you started on your first day of vacation, you should plan on making a trip to the grocery store to replenish these items as you need them.

PARKING: Parking is available at the property for no more than 1 vehicle, and availability may vary, please consult manager for availability prior to completing the reservation.  

GUEST'S LIABILITY: Guest agrees to accept liability for any damages caused to the real and personal property (other than normal wear and tear) by Guest, other authorized occupants or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit during the period of Guest's occupancy, including, but not limited to, landscaping, misuse of appliances, and/or equipment furnished. 

FALSIFIED RESERVATIONS: Any reservations obtained under false pretenses will be subject to forfeiture of all monies paid to date of discovery of falsified information, including all Fees and the Security Deposit, and individuals providing false information will not be permitted to check in or occupy the Unit and will be required to vacate the premises immediately upon discovery of any such falsified information.

RIGHT TO ENTER: Owner and Manager have the right to inspect the Unit at any time for any purpose, including but not limited to repairs, maintenance, inspection, verification of Guest status, monitoring of proper use of the Unit, improvements to the Unit, enforcing the terms of this Agreement, showing the Unit to prospective buyers and/or prospective future guests, attending to an emergency, or for any other reason whatsoever. Owner and/or Manager will provide 1-hour notice to Guest by phone or email, except in case of an emergency when no notice is required.

NO INSURANCE: Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for the safety of Guest, any other occupants of the Unit, or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit. Guest, all occupants of the Unit, and all other persons from time to time present in the Unit, are responsible for their own safety and should maintain a safe environment while in the Unit by locking doors, windows, garage doors, setting alarms if provided, etc., when appropriate to do so. Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for any items of personal property that may be lost, stolen or left behind in the Unit. Furthermore, Guest acknowledges and agrees that any homeowner's, renter's, or any other type of insurance that may be carried by Owner and/or Manager in connection with the Unit, does not cover the personal property of Guest or any other occupants of the Unit. Guest is encouraged to secure the appropriate travelers or vacation insurance and/or renters insurance, if such coverage is desired.

OWNER AND MANAGER NOT LIABLE: Owner and Manager do not assume any liability for loss, damage or injury to persons or their personal property while at or near the Unit. Neither do Owner and Manager accept liability for any inconvenience arising from any temporary defects or stoppage in supply of water, gas, electricity or plumbing. Nor will Owner and Manager accept liability for any loss or damage caused by weather conditions, natural disasters, acts of God, or other reasons beyond their control.

CHECK IN: Unless agreed differently by the Manager in writing, check-in is any time after 3:00 PM. Manager will send Tenant the instructions for a self check-in in advance, or keys or and entry-code will be provided at property location upon check-in. Keys will not be issued with a balance owing or without a signed rental agreement in the owners, or owner's representatives, possession. Once Tenant has checked into the unit or he/she has been granted access, Tenant accepts the condition, size and configuration of the Rental Premises in as/is where/is condition and accepts full financial responsibility per this agreement.

CHECK OUT: By 11:00 am. Charges for a late check-out not timely requested will be made against your security deposit for a minimum of the nightly rental fee. Please leave all keys, garage openers and such at the location. A $75 per item fee will be charged for each lost key, $120 for lost key fob and a $150 per parking transponder fee will be charged for each item not returned.

CLEANING: Each property will be inspected and cleaned after your departure. The cleaning fee you have paid will cover this. You are required to leave the property in the same general condition that you received it by making sure, dishes are done and put away, and the trash is generally picked up and ready to be vacuumed, dusted and sanitized. If additional cleaning is required, appropriate charges will be deducted from your security deposit at the rate of $50 per hour

WALKWAYS AND BALCONIES (SELECTED UNITS): The undersigned is fully aware that these can be dangerous, that the walkways/balcony and areas around can be slippery when wet, and that injury is likely to occur to anyone who is not careful. Tenants should observe and adhere to all rules and policies as posted at the property. With full knowledge of the above facts and warnings, the undersigned accepts and assumes all risks involved in or related to the use of the walkways/balcony.

PERSONAL PROPERTY LEFT BEHIND: If found, any items left behind will be mailed back upon request via USPS. The cost of shipping, shipping container and any packing materials will be deducted from the security deposit along with a handling fee.

access: All access. Coin operated laundry in basement of building.
description:
Bright and clean! Two blocks from beautiful Palmisano Park (wetlands and fishing pond). Family friendly neighborhood View of downtown from living room and kitchen windows. 8 blocks from lively Pilsen neighborhood. 
Free street parking available!

Guests can use kitchen, living room and master bedroom. There is a kids bedroom as well for a single child.

All access. Coin operated laundry in basement of building.

I am in the neighborhood.

Safe family friendly neighborhood Close to cafés, restaurants and bars including; Jackalope coffee, Nana, Maria's/ kimski's, Bridgeport coffee, Bodhi Thai, Pleasant House. Close to Pilsen art galleries, live music, bars and entertainment and just 2 blocks from Palmisano park.

8min walk to orange line Halsted stop.

The apartment is on the third floor of an older Chicago apartment building. This apartment has not been recently updated.

description:
This luxury Chicago Suite is all your large group needs to experience all that Chicago has to offer!  

We are ideally setup to host groups of 4 - 9 people.  The Suite comes with an incredible shared rooftop deck which is a perfect gathering spot for your group!

One of few Chicago Airbnb properties set up specifically for groups, our Suite's two bedrooms, common area, and kitchen make this the perfect stay for bachelor/ette parties, company trips, etc. 

We have more Suites in this building!

Each bedroom has been setup like a luxury hotel and we have put in 2 queen beds in each bedroom.  See below for a breakdown of the Suite:

PARKING: We have free street parking in the area.  Or you can reserve a spot for around $10 a night via SpotHero should you want a reserved spot.

2 bedroom  / 1 bath, each bedroom has 2 queen beds + sleeping for one on a couch in the living room. - 4 separate queen beds + couch.  Sleeps 9

There is also a shared rooftop deck in the rear of the building that is PERFECT for group gatherings!

We are available anytime by phone and guarantee a quick response! We pride ourselves on our guest service!

Located between Goose Island and Noble Square, virtually all of Chicago is in your reach. While West Town has some notable great locations, such as the Polish Museum of America, art centers, endless bars and restaurants, and coffee shops, our building puts you within arms reach of all of downtown Chicago's attractions.

Getting to your stay from O'Hare International Airport is VERY EASY.  We are approx. 3 blocks from the Chicago - Blue Line which will take you RIGHT to the Airport.  You can get to and from the airport in approx 30 minutes.  This is ideal as you do not have to transfer anytime during your commute to and from the Airport.

description:
Location, location! Beautiful brick 4-flat building in swanky Lincoln Park neighborhood. This unit is first floor with rear entrance from darling backyard! From the heart of the north side, walk to Clark St., Lincoln Ave, the 'El train' @ Fullerton.

Original hardwood floors, fixtures, and cabinets give a real vintage Chicago feel. Welcoming layout with modern and bright decor, good cross breeze, ground level unit. Outdoor patio.

Comfy living area, full kitchen w gas stove, private room. Laundry in basement and internet access.

I'm available for whatever you need.

Safety & convenience: This is one of the nicest areas in the city where you can walk with little concern anytime, with access to all parts of the city, including walking to the Lakefront if you like! Starbucks is two blocks away, Whole Foods, Marshall's, and plenty of other shopping within walking distance, as well as Lincoln Park Zoo and amazing Clark Street and Lincoln Avenue! 3 bar/restaurants down the block - across the street from destination restaurant Monkey's Paw!

Oh yeah. Getting to the Loop, downtown, Wicker Park, Andersonville.. all a breeze. Walk to Fullerton El stop Red, Brown, Purple lines) as well as Metra train (Clybourn) and Ashland and Fullerton buses. Also a rent-a bike station at the end of the block!!

If you're wondering what the reviewer meant by "shared" bathroom.. she meant she shared it with me, back when I rented this is a Private Room, not entire apartment. Not sure why she thought it was an issue.. she misunderstood a couple things...

access: The guest will have complete access to the apartment as they will be booking the whole place. Upon request, during the summer months, you will have access to the patio between the building and the garage. It is perfect to have a cup of coffee or a fun evening with some wine or beers under the canopy that protects you from the elements. The patio is my favorite place to hang out on a rainy or hot summer day because of the shade the trees surrounding the building provide. If you are a guest staying at the apartment, let me know and I will provide a key to the patio.
description:
My clean, updated apartment is right next to a CTA bus stop and grocery store! You can take one bus to all the train stations or Downtown within 15-20 minutes. Lyft and Uber are always in the area as well. 

My apartment is a beautiful place to relax. And being on the 3rd floor with a skylight gives you plenty of natural sun.

My 3rd floor apartment is the first place that I had on my own and I absolutely love staying there when I visit home. I currently live in Dallas but my family helps me host the place. 

It is a 3 bedroom, fully furnished with one queen bed and two full size beds that has a television with Netflix and Wi-fi. You will have an assortment of pots and pans in order to make yourself a home cooked meal along with all the essentials for your stay. Please bring your own toothbrush and toothpaste, though! :) 

When I got the place, I updated everything in the kitchen and bathroom to make a historic Chicago building feel brand new. There are stainless steel appliances and the stove is a cooktop with a granite countertop. 

The skylight is my favorite thing about my apartment and it allows plenty of natural sunlight to show off the  hardwood flooring and a relaxing setting with the trees that are right outside the 3 story building. 

The apartment is central to everything in the city. You can be in the suburbs within 20-25 minutes and the same goes for Downtown, Wrigley, United Center, Soldier Field and U.S Cellular Field.

The guest will have complete access to the apartment as they will be booking the whole place. Upon request, during the summer months, you will have access to the patio between the building and the garage. It is perfect to have a cup of coffee or a fun evening with some wine or beers under the canopy that protects you from the elements. The patio is my favorite place to hang out on a rainy or hot summer day because of the shade the trees surrounding the building provide. If you are a guest staying at the apartment, let me know and I will provide a key to the patio.

The place will be yours at all times. I will help guide you through the city as needed or I will be as reserved as you need me to be. My family is always available to help out as well. Whatever you need, please do not hesitate to ask so that we can make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

The apartment lies within a gentrifying neighborhood in the city so you will have a mix of local Latin culture and up and coming professionals who are looking for a place to call their home. 

My favorite part of my place is that it is only two blocks away from the newly built 606 Trail and it is on the other side of a grocery store called Carnicerias Jimenez. They are open until 10pm with any food items that you might need and the best part is that you don't have to drive anywhere for a "beer run." It is only steps away from the apartment. 

There is a restaurant called "La Casa del Tamal" and they have extremely good reviews. Check them out, you will not be disappointed - my favorite is their Champurrado. If you love tacos and Mexican food, there are also a few selections and if you tell me which kind you are looking for, I can point you in the best direction. 

With a 24 hour Walgreens and a CVS three blocks away, you will have anything you need right at your fingertips. 

Being born and raised in the city, I love living in a busy intersection that gets traffic 24 hours a day. If you want the real city experience, this is the way to do it. Chicago is not a city for the light sleepers!

The CTA (Chicago Transit Authority) runs 24 hours on North Ave and you are in front of the bus stop. 

Route 72 (North Ave) takes you straight to North Ave beach on Lake Michigan or to the popular Bucktown nightlife. 

Route 72 also takes you directly to the Blue or Red Line train stations. 

The blue line goes to the airport and will also take you to Union Station downtown or many other Chicago landmarks.

The red line can take you Downtown, Wrigley field, Loyola University, U.S Cellular field or Chinatown. 

UberX prices to many common places visited in the city: 
O'Hare international airport: $26 
Midway International airport: $19 
United Center: $12
The Bean/Art Institute/Millennium Park: $13
Wrigley Field : $16 
Magnificent Mile (Water Tower Place) : $15 
Willis Tower (Sears Tower) Observatory: $17 
McCormick Place: $23 
Soldier Field: $17

One thing I would like to point out is that I DO NOT charge a cleaning fee the way other hosts do. I do this with the intention that my guests will leave the place tidy (within reason). I do not expect my guests to wash the sheets or scrub the floors, but please do not leave trash on the ground and if you spill anything, please wipe it down as you would your own home. Keep in mind that this is my HOME and not a hotel room. I hope you respect it as such. I worked very hard to get my place looking the way it does and I hope the Airbnb community can help me keep it that way.

access:
Guest access

Guests have access to their unit.
description:
Southside Space is close to public transport, 1 block from the Red Line & Bus turnaround (20 minutes to downtown), less than a mile to Chicago State University.The unit gets lots of the light, has comfy beds, is convenient, and spacious, at a great price. Our place is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), and groups. If you are visiting people, or have business in the area there are few hotels. We welcome you here.

The space

This 3 bedroom unit has a large living room, balconies in front and back, huge bathroom with two sinks, and an eat-in kitchen. The unit is outfitted for your cooking needs and linens, towels, sheets, etc. are provided. The building has security cameras and locks are digital with four digit codes provided prior to your stay. There is central air and heat. Large screen TV in living room. Off street parking in the driveway or next to the garage, temporary permit provided.

Guest access

Guests have access to their unit.

Interaction with guests

I co-host and we are available through the app or by phone or text during your stay.  If you need anything feel free to contact me at anytime.

West Chesterfield is a small middle class, historically African-American neighborhood that values family, friends and their neighborhood. Though there are some fast food options nearby, most eating locations are driving distance. Restaurants that deliver can be found on Grub Hub and Uber Eats.

There is on-site parking available. We are also just one block from the 95th Street terminal, where the "L" train is located and where there is a bus hub. Greyhound buses also stop at this location. The Metra train station is about a mile away. The Red Line "L" will get you downtown and to other train lines, so you can connect to just about any other area in the city from there.

The building is on a busy street, which has its advantages and challenges. It is easy to get to the freeway or public transportation, but it is a busy location, with plenty of walking and street traffic on 95th street. There is a park across 95th street with a Chicago Park District Pool, and basketball courts as well as an open field and a jogging path. This is a predominantly African-American neighborhood, close to Chicago State University.
house_rules:
- After 10PM Please quiet down, be neighborly.
- There are no parties or get togethers allowed.

I co-host and we are available through the app or by phone or text during your stay.  If you need anything feel free to contact me at anytime.

description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this cozy Streeterville furnished two-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and sophisticated living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Chicago has to offer! (#CHI67)

Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your lovely living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Streeterville apartment has to offer.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:
  
- Doorman
- Pet Friendly
- Dog Park/Run
- Swimming Pool
- Gym
- Indoor Parking
- Garden

- Elevator

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.

Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

This furnished rental is located in Streeterville, only a 5 minute walk from The Loop. One of the fastest-developing neighborhoods in Chicago, Streeterville extends out into Lake Michigan and attracts a blend of young professionals, students, and tourists. A plethora of amenities and activities exist for every lifestyle. From Navy Pier activities to luxury shopping on Michigan Avenue, it is a walkable community with easy access to entertainment.

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.

access: Guests have access to all common rooms: the kitchen, living room, laundry room, and bathroom. We have a nice backyard and outside patio with table and chairs as well. Many of our doctors enjoy walking to the nearby shopping center to study at Starbucks or at our upscale Mariano's grocery store and restaurant as well as local restaurants, pubs, and night clubs.
description:
My place is close to Christ Hospital, Palos Community Hospital, and within commuting distance of various other area clinics and hospitals for rotations and observerships in Oak Lawn, Evergreen Park, Bridgeview, and other south suburbs of Chicago and far west Beverly neighborhood. My place is for medical students and grad students needing housing for internships, externships, match interviews, and STEP 2 CS testing.  Guests must verify their credentials.

This room is only available to students who can verify their credentials. It is a quite house reserved for students who are studying for medical exams. There is no TV in the house. Medical students and medical graduates can make connections, travel to preceptors together, and study together, while living in our home stay. It is a unique place to connect with other people with similar goals and requirements. This home is in a safe neighborhood and is within walking distance to pubs, restaurants, and night clubs. You will feel comfortable here. Each private room has a keyed entry. All guests are given a set of keys for their room and the house, which must be returned at check out.

Guests have access to all common rooms: the kitchen, living room, laundry room, and bathroom. We have a nice backyard and outside patio with table and chairs as well. Many of our doctors enjoy walking to the nearby shopping center to study at Starbucks or at our upscale Mariano's grocery store and restaurant as well as local restaurants, pubs, and night clubs.

We live next door and will take the time to help you get acclimated. We can assist you with getting a Ventra Card for traveling on public transportation. We also help our guests figure out how to get to and from their preceptor's location, and we can provided an additional driving service if needed. Just inquire. We offer to drive our guests to the store for groceries each week, if they do not have a car.

We live in a quiet family friendly neighborhood. You won't hear loud music at night. Oak Lawn is a safe community. You will feel comfortable walking in our neighborhood. We have many restaurants, salons, shops, and grocery stores.

Our suburb is just outside the city of Chicago and the house is just a couple blocks from the CTA Harding bus terminal.Our home is close to the 53a CTA bus line, which runs to the orange line that can be accessed from Midway airport to downtown Chicago. We are also a couple miles from the SWS metro train system as well. By car we are only about 30 minutes from downtown Chicago. We are about a mile from Advocate Christ Hospital.

We offer assistance with personal statement writing exclusively for our guests who are applying for the match. Ask for more information. 

Our residents who stay with us during the holidays are always invited to our house as special guests. We treat our home stay residents like family.

additional_house_rules:
(1) Remove shoes upon entering the house
(2) Smoke-free household: No smoking on premises, inside the house or yard 
(3) No loud music or parties in the room 
(4) No additional guests allowed 
(5) Cannot conduct any illegal business from the room/house 
(6) No use of drugs or other illegal substance 
(7) Any property damage will have to be paid in full 
(8) Keep the place clean 
(9) No pets
(10) Do not use towels to remove your makeup. There is a $25 charge for each damaged or missing towel.
(11) If you break the house rules, you will be asked to leave and no refund will be issued

access:
Common area on main floor dining room and kitchen for light breakfast.
Wifi
Free street parking
description:
Private suite with 3 beds ( 2 queen sized beds and large sectional sofa) available in private 900 square foot suite that has 1 full bath. The design and decor is contemporary and modern.  Located super close Lake  Shore Drive and beaches. Downtown is just minutes away via car, Uber or bus!

Enjoy a 900 square foot private suite on a private floor with private bath room in a luxurious, bright and spacious row home located short distance from Lake Michigan, beaches, Chicago's world-class museums and McCormick Place Convention Center, Soldier Field, Cellular Field, University of Chicago, Illinois Institute of Technology and more. 

This spacious 900 square foot private suite with private bath features a bedroom, an additional room with queen sized bed and large sectional sofa ectional sofa, 40 inch flat screen TV and DVD player. The sectional sofa is comfortable and large enough to accommodate additional guests for sleeping as well. Please note that babies and toddlers should be accurately included in the reservation head count as per Airbnb guidelines.

The main floor (common area) has an open floor plan with a living/dining/kitchen area that easily flows to a lovely deck and tree-shaded yard. There is ample room for six at the dining table and the kitchen island comfortably seats three. If you prefer the outdoors, there is a patio table and chairs. Great way to unwind and relax while enjoying your favorite beverage after a day at the beach or site seeing.

Bathrooms are equipped with guest towels and basic toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, liquid soap and body lotion). 

Amenities: 
free wi-fi internet access, dvd player, and FREE street parking. 

Easy public transportation is located nearby - CTA buses, red and green line "L" trains and the Metra electric. The lakefront is within walking distance. All venues of interest are easily accessible by bus/transit or car as downtown is located 4 miles away. 

Noteworthy venues nearby: McCormick Place Convention Center, Chinatown, University of Chicago, Museum of Science and Industry, Illinois Institute of Technology and President Obama's home and more.

Common area on main floor dining room and kitchen for light breakfast.
Wifi
Free street parking

I am generally readily available if you have questions or need assistance during your stay. I offer guests maximum privacy yet I'm generally available to assist you whenever you want and/or need me.

Located just 4 miles south of downtown Chicago in a quiet residential neighborhood. The house has a view of Lake Michigan and very easy access to the nearby beaches, bike path, museums, art institute, Hyde Park, University and Chinatown. there is a grocery store and restaurant within walking 3blocks walking distance. Please note that this is a quiet residential neighborhood not a party zone with lots of bars.

Public transportation options: buses, trains, Uber!!
1. Take  #4 bus to get downtown along Michigan Avenue (millennium park, art institute, John hancock,etc)
2. By car take Lake Shore Drive to get to/from downtown. 10 minutes depending on traffic
house_rules:
(1) Remove shoes upon entering the house
(2) Smoke-free household: No smoking on premises, inside the house or yard 
(3) No loud music or parties in the room 
(4) No additional guests allowed 
(5) Cannot conduct any illegal business from the room/house 
(6) No use of drugs or other illegal substance 
(7) Any property damage will have to be paid in full 
(8) Keep the place clean 
(9) No pets
(10) Do not use towels to remove your makeup. There is a $25 charge for each damaged or missing towel.
(11) If you break the house rules, you will be asked to leave and no refund will be issued
interaction: I am generally readily available if you have questions or need assistance during your stay. I offer guests maximum privacy yet I'm generally available to assist you whenever you want and/or need me.

Please note that this is a quiet residential neighborhood not a party zone with lots of bars.

access: Private entrance to a stand-alone building.
description: Kick back under tin ceilings at a machine shop turned airy, bright studio. Chill in the claw foot tub surrounded by leafy house plants, or crack a book in the open living space with its bold artwork, mid century furniture, and modern lighting.
house_rules: Late check-out that isn't approved ahead of time may result in being charged 50% of the nightly booking rate.
interaction: We are available by phone, and live on premise, but only if you need anything! We're always happy to give neighborhood recommendations, and help solve any problems.
neighborhood_overview: Humboldt Park is hip, diverse, and ideal for people who want local flavor without giving up access to popular destinations. Hit up cool neighborhood joints, take a leisurely stroll to Wicker Park, or jump on transit to get into the thick of things.
space:
A converted 1930's machine shop, the studio has 14-foot tin ceilings, original steel I-beams, and large windows. The building's windows are directly on the sidewalk - this is dense city living.

The apartment is ideal for a single traveler or a couple: it has an open-bath concept, and the bathtub is visible from the living area.
summary: Kick back under tin ceilings at a machine shop turned airy, bright studio. Chill in the claw foot tub surrounded by leafy house plants, or crack a book in the open living space with its bold artwork, mid century furniture, and modern lighting.
transit: We are a 1/2 mile walk to the Blue Line at either the Western or Damen stations, and steps from both the 49 (Western Avenue) and 72 (North Avenue) bus routes.

access:
Chicago Club Inn & Suites features an indoor pool, as well as a fitness room. Business-related amenities include a 24-hour business center, 2 meeting rooms, and complimentary wireless and wired high-speed Internet access.

A complimentary breakfast buffet is served each morning and includes assorted hot items. The hotel also offers a 24-hour coffee bar in the lobby.

An outdoor courtyard can access the hotel's wireless network and includes gazebos, patio areas, and gas grills. The hotel has two meeting rooms that can accommodate small groups and on-site parking is complimentary.

The green line train station is only 8 minutes walk away. Only 20 minutes to downtown by train and buses. Free street car parking. Easy access to restaurants, coffee shops and nightlife. Open bedroom and bathroom, lots of space for company and friends.

You will come through the front door i will buzz you from my phone and leave the door open for you with key on the table for you

Here whenever you need me.

Community Amenities: Online Payments Available, 24 Hour Fitness Gym, Rooftop Deck with Grill Stations, Bike Storage, Elevator, Smartphone Video Intercom System,

Bus and train around the corner and right infant of the building.

Must be mindful of the street signs to avoid fines and tows.
description:
Welcome to Windy City! Your next home away from home, you will absolutely love the location, the space, and the unique architecture.

The unit is on the 2nd floor of the building. This 3-bedroom apartment can comfortably sleep 6, with three private bedrooms, each features a queen-size bed each.

The apartment includes one full bathroom, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!

There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary decor. The entire place has free, fast WiFi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.

Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite countertops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!!

This unit does NOT have a designated parking space. Street parking can be easy during the day but gets limited at night. 

Must be mindful of the street signs to avoid fines and tows.

Our place is yours and only yours during your stay. We do ask that you respect our neighbors by keeping noise to a reasonable level.

The neighborhood is a very peaceful community and very walkable- most errands can be accomplished on. It is also near public transport. 

Completely a vibrant and colorful experience as this is home to a diversified international offerings, a melting pot of culture that blend in together as a community. Devon Avenue is popular to locals and travellers alike to have that taste of Indian & Pakistani home grown delicacies and the feel of the marketplace shopping for clothing, fabrics and international grocers.

The closest grocery stores are ALDI, Ted's Fresh Market and Nohadra Grocery. Nearby coffee shops include Starbucks, Starbucks and Art Zone Cafe. Nearby restaurants include Gogi, Burger Hub and Yeowoosai. The unit is also near Green Briar Park, Mather Park and Chippewa Park.

You should not miss a visit to Talman West Ridge Bungalow Historic District, where local architects began experimenting with form and style to create bungalows that are unique to Chicago.

Do some outdoor adventures at Warren Park, a green oasis featuring something for every season — like batting cages, a 9-hole golf course, racquetball, basketball, tennis courts, and an ice-skating rink.

Unless you’re really fond of meters or parallel parking, we recommend using public transportation to explore the Chicago area. Parking is easy during the day but difficult at night. There is a metered parking one block away from the building but you have to get the car at 8am to avoid getting towed.

-The owner lives in the groundfloor.

-Please be aware If you lose the key and entry fob, which is your access to the entire building, it cannot be replaced for you immediately and you may lose access to the apartment unit and all amenities until another one can be made. There is a $300 fee for losing key and entry fob.

-All guests need to be attentive to the house rules during their stay, as they are other tenants at the property.

-Bath towels are provided per number of guest not per number of stay

-Washcloths are not provided during your stay. You may send me a message though if you need them and I'll try my best to accommodate your request.

-We have duvet covers on our beddings  (no top sheets).

-A Security Deposit may be required on some bookings. 

-If there's an issue during your stay, please report it real time so we can address it right away.

additional_house_rules:
1. You're living like a local, be respectful of the other locals. We mean, c'mon, how would you feel if your neighbor wasn't super awesome? 

2. All of our Rental Units are smoke-free environments. Even on the balcony, if you have one. We're super sorry if this is a bummer, but it's our policy. Hopefully we told you about it ahead of time and you aren't super surprised that we still mean it. 

3. Pets are super awesome, but they aren't allowed in our Rental Units. However, if your fur kiddo is a service animal then give us a call and we will make reasonable efforts to accommodate your needs, as required by law.  

4. Your trip details should already be complete. If they aren't, give us a call ASAP so we can rectify that! What's a little information between friends?  

5. Your friend, your responsibility. Pretty simple, if you invite them to your Rental Unit, you're responsible for their actions.  

6. While watching a million people get out of a clown car is hilarious, there are occupancy rules Stay Alfred must follow for each of our buildings. Help us follow the rules and check your rental contract for occupancy requirements. If you exceed it, don't worry! Give us a call and we'll get you one of our bigger travel apartments. (It's like needing an Uber XL when you have a ton of people with you!) 

7. We're here to help! The onsite building staff doesn't work for Stay Alfred…strange, right? So, if you need something, send us a chat, or just give us a call. Our awesome Guest Services department will assist you 24/7.

8. Take only memories, leave only the keys, fobs, parking passes, etc. behind. They won't help you out when you get home and it's a total pain to have to replace them. 

9. We love gifts, but the greatest gift is making sure you don't leave anything behind. We suggest taking one last look around before you head home as fees are associated with sending you your belongings. Trust us, the extra five minutes is worth it! 

10. Ugh, here's the hard one. Should you break anything, really mess something up, or decide to stay longer than your agreed upon length of stay, we have the right to charge you additional fees, but we'd really rather not (and, we're sure you'd rather not too!)

11. Guests must be 21 years of age or older to make a Reservation, and the Guest who made the Reservation must be present for the duration of the stay. If the Guest who made the Reservation isn't present during the stay, occupants may be removed from the Rental Unit, and the Reservation may be canceled without refund.

description:
Upscale travel apartments featuring full kitchens and high-end amenities in the heart of Chicago's South Loop

These stylish South Loop travel apartments are the perfect home base for any trip to Chicago, whether you're coming to town on business or for a vacation with the fam. Nestled between Chi-Town highlights like the Field Museum and sprawling Grant Park, every apartment features a spacious floor plan, a full kitchen with modern appliances, and essentials like cable TV and free, fast WiFi. The building certainly doesn't skimp on the amenities either, with a resident lounge, business center, and a sunny rooftop deck with barbecue stations.

We believe in personal space. Prior to your arrival, your unit will be professionally cleaned and your self guided check in process ensures easy arrival with no long lines. Should you need us, we're here 24/7 with our guest services team and local folks on the ground. And if you don't need us, we'll stay out of your way. After all, this is your place in the city.

We furnish all of our properties to a uniform standard, but individual units may differ slightly from the pictures shown.

access: The apartment is spaced with rooms on either end so you will have plenty of privacy. The large bedroom and closet will give allow you ample storage for luggage and clothing. Amenities in room include iron, hairdryer, AC unit for your control, and TV in the room with amazon fire with many paid options. Daily parking permits provided. Apartment has been upgraded with keyless entry for a flawless and flexible arrival!
description:
Cozy two bedroom apartment in the quiet and central neighborhood of River West. Conveniently located steps from public transportation of the Chicago Blue line stop and newly remodeled bus depot for the 66 bus. Also a 2 mile ride to the Clyborne Metra Station. 

This listing is for the master bedroom in the apartment. Guest room may also be rented out to other Airbnb guests.  This room has easy access to the patio and laundry facility accessible to all guests.

You will have use of all common areas. Master bedroom has laundry and patio access. May be used by other guests if requested. Patio use will be seasonal.

The apartment is spaced with rooms on either end so you will have plenty of privacy. The large bedroom and closet will give allow you ample storage for luggage and clothing. Amenities in room include iron, hairdryer, AC unit for your control, and TV in the room with amazon fire with many paid options. Daily parking permits provided. Apartment has been upgraded with keyless entry for a flawless and flexible arrival!

You may have interaction with other guests sharing of public spaces. If you are renting this room, host may not be present to allow you full use the space. In some cases you may have the whole place to yourself.
house_rules: Must allow access for other guests to use shared spaces (washer and drier and outdoor patio).

description: Admire nearby Frank Lloyd Wright homes on a sunny morning stroll before perching on a farmhouse-style stool for a morning snack at the breakfast bar. A muted color palette and natural materials give this city sanctuary a calm ambience.
house_rules:
- No Shoes in the House
- Quiet hours: 10pm-7am
interaction: I am happy to offer Chicago/local recommendations specifically tailored to your interests. A week before your arrival, I will be in touch to provide check in directions.
neighborhood_overview: The quiet, tree-lined street sits a few blocks south of the CTA Blue Line stop, close to cafes and nightlife on bustling Madison Avenue. The Park District of Forest Park, with ball fields and tennis courts, is a short walk away.
notes: There are two other apartments in the building that are occupied and there are pets on the property, but you generally won't interact with spaces they use.
space:
A well-appointed, recently remodeled basement apartment with 1 bedroom and bathroom and an open living/dining/kitchen space. Sleeps 4 adults comfortably, queen bed in bedroom and double sofa bed (pull-out) in living room. 

Space has private entrance, fully-equipped gourmet kitchen with high-end stainless appliances, gas stove, convection oven, Keurig coffee maker, toaster and breakfast nook.

The apartment is air-conditioned and comes with a Nest thermostat, so you can be comfortable. 

HD cable with HBO, fast Wifi and a large flat screen TV are included. 

Spa-like bathroom with plenty of storage space, luxury towels, and hotel quality toiletries from Theorie.
summary: Admire nearby Frank Lloyd Wright homes on a sunny morning stroll before perching on a farmhouse-style stool for a morning snack at the breakfast bar. A muted color palette and natural materials give this city sanctuary a calm ambience.
transit: One private parking spot available at the rear of the building. Subway (El train) and Eisenhower expressway are a few blocks away.

description:
This listing is PERFECT for Large groups wanting to stay in the same location. Perfect for Weddings / Corporate. With this reservation, you will receive the following  

-2 Separate Buildings literally next door to each other. 
- Building 1: 4 Individual Suites, 2 parking garages, 2 private Roof Decks, 8 Bedrooms/6 Bathrooms/20 Queen Beds/Sleeps up to 40 people.
- Building 2: 3 Individual Suites, private parking lot, private Roof Deck, 7 Bedrooms/6 Bathrooms/16 Queen Beds/Sleeps up to 34 people.

This listing is absolutely perfect for people planning a wedding.  Have one family and friends stay in one building and have the other family and friends in the other building.

PEOPLE EVEN HAVE THE ACTUAL WEDDING RECEPTION OR REHEARSAL DINNERS ON OUR ROOF DECK!  You will save a ton of money coming here instead of booking different venues, caterers and hotels.

We are also perfect for Corporate Housing, people coming for conventions/reunions.  If you have a lot of people coming to Chicago, you want to stay here!

description:
An oasis in West Town, Chicago - steps away from bars, restaurants and entertainment - while being only ten minutes from the downtown core. This stunning and recently redecorated unit sleeps 5, and will be your home away from home!

We live in the area and are always just a text or email away.

If you are looking for a breakfast spot, look no further then the "Breakfast House", just steps away from our back door on Grand Ave and Wood. Goose Island's Tap room is just 4 block south, same for the Great Central Brewing Company. Chicago's United Center is just another 4 blocks past the breweries.

The apartment is just around the corner from the the CTA 65 Grand bus that will take you to the Blue line, Navy Pier and the Magnificent Mile.

- Please turn off lights/AC/heat when you leave the unit

additional_house_rules:
HOUSE RULES
I’m happy to have you in my home.  I trust that you will respect it as if it was your own and that you will respect our neighborhood and neighbors. . I ask that you follow these rules:
 
-Absolutely no parties or gatherings.  People not listed in the reservation are not allowed to enter the apartment.
-No standing or gathering by the front door.  If you are waiting for a taxi or Uber, wait by the sidewalk.
-If you enter/exit the building during quiet hours (10pm-7am), you must be very quiet to not disturb neighbors.
-If you are planning on checking in/out during quiet hours, you must contact me in advance as there are special instructions.
-Pick up all garbage (bottles, boxes, bags, etc.) from all living spaces and throw it away. The garbage cans are located by the alley in the back of the building next to the garage.
-Do not bring any food or beverages into the bedrooms.
-Do not use towels to clean shoes, make up or any dirty items.  Towels are only meant to be used to dry yourselves.
-Do not hang wet towels on the shower curtain rod; use the drying rack that is in one of the bedrooms.
-No smoking.
-No pets.
-Turn off all lights, TV, and air conditioning units when you are not in the apartment.
-Wash any used dishes.
-Right before you check out, turn off the air conditioning units and all the lights.
-Empty the fridge before you check out.

access: Guest have access to all areas of apartment. Guests do not have access to backyard area except when smoking outside.
description:
Beautiful apartment at a great price for up to 8 guests! Four bedrooms with very comfortable beds & 2 full bathrooms, close to public transportation (Red Line Station "Lawrence"), near the lake, and minutes away from most happening Chicago's neighborhoods of Wrigleyville (Wrigley Field is there), Andersonville and Boystown.

1 car garage included upon request from guest.

This is a beautiful, spacious and charming apartment in a three level building located in a quiet Chicago Historic Landmark District.

The apartment has 4 bedrooms ready for Airbnb guests and 2 full bathroom. The entire apartment was recently renovated, but all its character and cozy features were kept. There is a large living room, a dinning room, a big kitchen with new appliances, and the backyard is great! 

The kitchen has all your basic needs including plates, cups, silverware, coffee, and tea. There is also in-building washing and drying.

Each room has a comfortable queen size beds, nightstand, and a closet. Both rooms have huge windows, which means tons of natural light.

Guest have access to all areas of apartment. Guests do not have access to backyard area except when smoking outside.

The apartment is located in a quiet Chicago Historic Landmark District.

The most vivid and eventful neighborhoods of Chicago such as Andersonville, Lakeview, Uptown and Wrigleyville are literally few minutes away.

The apartment is less than a ten-minute walk from the “Lawrence" Red Line Train Station. The train runs 24hrs a day and can get you to many awesome neighborhoods in a short amount of time. The ride to Chicago downtown takes about 25 minutes. There are also multiple buses that stop just a block away, but the train is the fastest way to go.

Each ride costs $2.25, but you can buy a 1-Day Pass for $10, a 3-Day Pass for $20 and a 7-Day Pass for $28.

Parking 
There is free street parking available around the building and on Lawrence Ave.

My apartment is located in one of the historic buildings of Chicago Dover Historic Landmark. Building has a steam heating system. At times during winter when temperatures are very low and system works continuously radiators make noise.

additional_house_rules:
1. Prohibited: Video Shooting, bring people that is not in the reservation, Small gatherings, family reunions, birthdays parties or any kind of celebrations. 
2. No smoke inside the house or building (any kind) 
3. Respect other Airbnb guests, belongings, food and other rooms.
4. Be quiet in the house and in the building specially after 9pm. 
5. Checkout from your room is by 10am and our checkout is firm becase our team schedule. Checkout from your room after this time will end in extra 30$. Checkout after 11am will end in extra 60$. Checkout after 12pm will end in an open  file in airbnb plus 60$ fee (2 hours paid for management team) and your belongings would have to be removed since another guest will be checking in.
6. If you use the kitchen, microwave, oven, plates, pans, pots, glasses, cups, kitchen table, living room table, coffee maker, fridge, etc.. you have to leave it clean
7. After use the shower / bathtub clean the hairs you left. Take your own amenities with you. Don’t leave it in the bathroom.
8. Booking for somebody else is not allowed unless agreed before booking.
9. No one can’t sleep in common areas.
10. We will send you missing items if you want but it will be 40$ plus shipping.

Ps: missing items fees are: 20$ hourly rate house manager plus 20$ Uber (go and return) plus the key or the shipping) 

BREAKING ANY RULE OR DOING ANY ILLEGAL ACTIVITY WILL END UP IN A IMMEDIATE CANCELLATION PF YOUR RESERVATION AND YOU WILL HAVE TO LEAVE THE PLACE IMMEDIATELY. Our top one priority is our guests’ security and provide a quiet stay!

access: You can use the kitchen (please turn on the kitchen fan once you use it), oven, pan, pots, plates, coffee maker, etc! You can use living room, hair dryer, iron. You will have WiFi, clean towels (1 p/p) , sheets, comforter, Shampoo (2in1), hand’s soap, body’s soap, toilet paper.
description:
Welcome to this Vintage, safe Multicultural Neighborhood where you can find some of the Irish culture but also Polish and Eastern Europe. This is the perfect spot  conveniently located to those who go to or from O’hare Airport because the train close by is the one that takes you inside the Airport in about 25min. Also, straight Downtown Chicago in about 25min.We offer Wifi,coffee maker,microwave,iron, hair dryer,pretty much everything you might need. We have cameras in common areas and keypads!

You will have a comfortable Full Size Bed in a private room! We want you feel very safe so your room is going to have its own padlock and there are cameras in common areas. 

This is a private room in a shared place with other Airbnb guests and because of that we expect to keep the house  very quiet, specially after 9pm.

There are free parking on the street easy to find before 5pm, plenty paid parking around the house. 

*I only accept payments through Airbnb platform*

You can use the kitchen (please turn on the kitchen fan once you use it), oven, pan, pots, plates, coffee maker, etc! You can use living room, hair dryer, iron. You will have WiFi, clean towels (1 p/p) , sheets, comforter, Shampoo (2in1), hand’s soap, body’s soap, toilet paper.

If you text Alejandra she will be there for you most of the time she is going to give you quick responses! If you are a tourist she will love to share some places you can’t miss!

This place is conveniently located becase it’s between O’hare Airport and Downtown Chicago and we use the blue line train which is close to the house (7 min by walk or 2 min by bus) that will take you straightforwardly both places ! We have a Home Dpt Store just 1 block away and a Family D in case you need to buy any emergency cloth or amenities or food!

There are few free street parking by kimball usually easy to find before 5pm. 152 bus is just 1/2 block away. Addison Blue Line is 8min walk or 5min by bus. 82 bus is 1 block away. . McCormick Place is 20min far by car/Uber . United Center is 17 min far by car. Illinois Medical District is 17min by car. Grant Park is 21min by car/35min by public transportation. The Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium and the Planetarium is 23min far by car. Private Uber / Lyft or Via are around 20$ to those places!

The room is private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private small apartment in the area usually cost over 120$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being conveniently located, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! 

The room has one full size bed. If you want to add 3 guests in the reservation I could add 1 extra air mattress with no extra fee if the reservation is set for 3. If the reservation is for 2 and you’d like to have an extra air mattress we charge $15p/night and we provide air mattress and linens for it. The room will become smaller for luggage becase you will have two beds on it. This is a good option if you want to save even more money otherwise you can book two rooms! 
As most houses in United States this is not made with concrete so you will hear people walking or outside sounds. It doesn’t bother most of the guest but if you are a very light sleeper maybe you should choose an entire place, or have an earphone or something to block the sound.

We have cameras in common areas as outside the building, living room, kitchen, hallway. Of course we don’t have cameras in bathroom or rooms. 

Is forbidden in this place: parties, small gatherings, to bring people who are not in the reservation, family reunions, birthdays celebration, video shooting,  being noisy, smoke and bring pets. 

We work based in all airbnb policies, terms and conditions including cancelation policy, so makes sure before you book to read carefully houses rules or cancelation policy.
house_rules:
1. Prohibited: Video Shooting, bring people that is not in the reservation, Small gatherings, family reunions, birthdays parties or any kind of celebrations. 
2. No smoke inside the house or building (any kind) 
3. Respect other Airbnb guests, belongings, food and other rooms.
4. Be quiet in the house and in the building specially after 9pm. 
5. Checkout from your room is by 10am and our checkout is firm becase our team schedule. Checkout from your room after this time will end in extra 30$. Checkout after 11am will end in extra 60$. Checkout after 12pm will end in an open  file in airbnb plus 60$ fee (2 hours paid for management team) and your belongings would have to be removed since another guest will be checking in.
6. If you use the kitchen, microwave, oven, plates, pans, pots, glasses, cups, kitchen table, living room table, coffee maker, fridge, etc.. you have to leave it clean
7. After use the shower / bathtub clean the hairs you left. Take your own amenities with you. Don’t leave it in the bathroom.
8. Booking for somebody else is not allowed unless agreed before booking.
9. No one can’t sleep in common areas.
10. We will send you missing items if you want but it will be 40$ plus shipping.

Ps: missing items fees are: 20$ hourly rate house manager plus 20$ Uber (go and return) plus the key or the shipping) 

BREAKING ANY RULE OR DOING ANY ILLEGAL ACTIVITY WILL END UP IN A IMMEDIATE CANCELLATION PF YOUR RESERVATION AND YOU WILL HAVE TO LEAVE THE PLACE IMMEDIATELY. Our top one priority is our guests’ security and provide a quiet stay!

description:
High-end, luxury apartment centrally located to all of Chicago's top restaurants, bars, shopping and attractions. This 1 bed, 1 bath unit features an open floor plan, wood plank flooring, a spacious bedroom, roomy walk-in closet and in-unit laundry. The floor to ceiling glass windows let in lots of natural light, views of Navy Pier (Fireworks), Lake Michigan and some of the best sunrises you'll see.

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:
- Doorman
- Swimming Pool
- Hot Tub
- Sauna
- Gym (Weight Room, Cardio Room, Fitness Room, Yoga Room)
- Sky Deck (Fire Pits, Bags Game, Navy Pier Fireworks)
- Sky Deck Lounge with Kitchen and TVs
- Pool Deck Lounge with Grills and TVs
- Common Area Lounge with TVs
- Pool Table and Game Room
- Computer Room
- Board Room

Available 24/7/365
I will meet you and give tour of building.

Centrally located on borders of River North, Gold Coast, the Loop and Magnificent Mile. 10 min drive to West Loop, Old Town and Lincoln Park. 3 blocks from Navy Pier, the lakefront, Ohio Street Beach, the Chicago River (River Walk). 2 blocks from the Magnificent Mile and Chicago's best shopping and restaurants. Walkable to Millennium, Maggie Daley and Grant Parks and the Art Institute. 10 min drive to museum campus and Soldier Field.

Easy access to cabs, Ubers and Grand/State train stop (3 blocks away).

additional_house_rules:
****bookings without reviews will have to provide an ID via the Airbnb messaging system or at check in. LOCAL, one night stays must provide IDS of all guests via messaging system PRIOR to check in. NO UNAUTHORIZED GUESTS ALLOWED****

NO SMOKING IN THE UNIT. $200 fine + cleaning fees.

Please take shoes off in unit. It's a Japanese thing and it keeps the unit cleaner. Thank you.

Please wash your dishes. There will be a $25 fee for anything more than a handful of dishes left behind.

Please BE HONEST about extra guests (first 3 guests are included in price). The extra guest fee will be doubled if you are deceptive. There are cameras on the exterior of the building.

Absolutely NO parties. Guests will be immediately evicted without refund. IF YOU ARE TRYING TO BE SLICK AND THROW A PARTY AND/OR THEN TRY TO CANCEL: I WILL KEEP WHATEVER MONEY YOU PAY PER THE CANCELLATION POLICY. 

I want to preface the following by saying 95% of our guests leave our places in amazing condition. We are very understanding about small messes that may have been overlooked as I know I am by no means perfect. That being said the following is to address the 5% who may not understand quite how airbnb works yet. 
1. We are not a hotel. 
2. We are not your personal maids. 

While there is a cleaning fee, the fee is to cover changing of linens, washing of towels and "normal" cleaning of the kitchen, bathroom and living areas. What is not covered and WILL incur an extra fee are the following: 

1. A pile of dishes left in the sink (violates house rules)
2. Excessive kitchen messes such as cooking grease all over the stove.
3. Excessive food on the floors (I dont mean a few crumbs-I mean it looked like someone was feeding pigeons).
4. Chewing gum ground into the furniture (yes, that has actually happened).
5. OBVIOUS wearing of shoes in the unit (we are a no-shoes house- see house rules) ie shoes foot prints, tracked in dirt and mud.
5. Anything else above and beyond what is considered "normal" cleaning. 
6. smoking in the unit will AUTOMATICALLY  incur a $200 fee. 

Again- this ISNT the majority of our guests and we understand things can be overlooked. Upon an "excessive cleaning" situation, I will not leave any review, I will simply send a request for an extra cleaning fee (usually around $25-50) depending on how much extra time it took to clean. Thank you for your understanding. 


Have fun!
